choose.when: ORDER BY ( CASE WHEN PRJ_NAME REGEXP '^[a-zA-Z].+$' then 1 WHEN PRJ_NAME REGEXP '^[가-힣].+$' then 2 WHEN PRJ_NAME REGEXP '^[0-9].+$' then 3 ELSE 4 END), PRJ_NAME
ORDER BY ( CASE WHEN PRJ_NAME REGEXP '^[a-zA-Z].+$' then 4 WHEN PRJ_NAME REGEXP '^[가-힣].+$' then 3 WHEN PRJ_NAME REGEXP '^[0-9].+$' then 2 ELSE 1 END), PRJ_NAME
ORDER BY ( CASE IDENTIFICATION_STATUS WHEN '' THEN 1 WHEN 'NA' THEN 2 WHEN 'PROG' THEN 3 WHEN 'REQ' THEN 4 WHEN 'REV' THEN 5 WHEN 'CONF' THEN 6 END )

ORDER BY ( CASE WHEN IDENTIFICATION_STATUS != 'CONF' THEN 1 WHEN VERIFICATION_STATUS = '' AND IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND IFNULL(A.COMPLETE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' THEN 2 WHEN VERIFICATION_STATUS = '' AND A.COMPLETE_YN = 'Y' THEN 3 WHEN VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'NA' THEN 4 WHEN VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'PROG' THEN 5 WHEN VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'REQ' THEN 6 WHEN VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'REV' THEN 7 WHEN VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' THEN 8 END )

ORDER BY ( CASE WHEN IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND IFNULL(DISTRIBUTE_TARGET, 'NA') != 'NA' AND DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'ERROR' THEN 7 WHEN IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND IFNULL(DISTRIBUTE_TARGET, 'NA') != 'NA' AND DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'DONE' THEN 6 WHEN IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND IFNULL(DISTRIBUTE_TARGET, 'NA') != 'NA' AND DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'RSV' THEN 5 WHEN IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND IFNULL(DISTRIBUTE_TARGET, 'NA') != 'NA' AND DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'PROG' THEN 4 WHEN (IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'NA' AND DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'NA') OR (IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND DISTRIBUTE_TARGET = 'NA' AND IFNULL(A.COMPLETE_YN, 'N') = 'Y') THEN 3 WHEN (IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'NA') OR (VERIFICATION_STATUS != '' AND VERIFICATION_STATUS != 'CONF' AND IFNULL(A.COMPLETE_YN, 'N') = 'Y') OR (DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = '' AND IFNULL(A.COMPLETE_YN, 'N') = 'Y') THEN 3 WHEN VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = '' AND IFNULL(A.COMPLETE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END )
ORDER BY (SELECT CD.CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL CD WHERE CD.CD_NO = '207' AND CD.CD_DTL_NO = DISTRIBUTION_TYPE)
ORDER BY (SELECT CD.CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL CD WHERE CD.CD_NO = '200' AND CD.CD_DTL_NO = DIVISION)
ORDER BY (SELECT USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS WHERE USER_ID = REVIEWER) IS NULL ASC, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS WHERE USER_ID = REVIEWER)

mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(CONCAT(T1.CD_ORDER, T2.CD_ORDER), '|', CONCAT(T1.CD_DTL_NO, T2.CD_DTL_NO), '|', T1.CD_DTL_NM, ' > ', T2.CD_DTL_NM ) AS CODE FROM T2_CODE_DTL T1 INNER JOIN T2_CODE_DTL T2 ON T1.CD_SUB_NO = T2.CD_NO AND T2.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T1.CD_NO = #{code} ORDER BY T1.CD_ORDER, T2.CD_ORDER

SELECT CONCAT(A.PRJ_ID, 'N' , @rownum:=@rownum+1) as GRID_ID , CONCAT(A.CATEGORY, A.SUBCATEGORY) AS CATEGORY , A.MODEL_NAME , A.RELEASE_DATE , IFNULL(A.MODIFIER, '') AS MODIFIER , IFNULL(A.MODIFIED_DATE, '') AS MODIFIED_DATE , A.OSDD_SYNC_YN FROM PROJECT_MODEL A, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE A.PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND DEL_YN <> 'Y' ORDER BY CATEGORY, MODEL_NAME

SELECT CONCAT(A.PRJ_ID, 'Y' , @rownum:=@rownum+1) as GRID_ID , CONCAT(A.CATEGORY, A.SUBCATEGORY) AS CATEGORY , A.MODEL_NAME , A.RELEASE_DATE , A.MODIFIER , A.MODIFIED_DATE , A.OSDD_SYNC_YN FROM PROJECT_MODEL A, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE A.PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND DEL_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CATEGORY, MODEL_NAME

SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.DIVISION PRJ_DIVISION , C.CD_DTL_NM PRJ_DIVISION_NAME , A.USER_ID PRJ_USER_ID , U.USER_NAME PRJ_USER_NAME , A.EMAIL PRJ_EMAIL , U.USE_YN AS USER_USE_YN , C.USE_YN AS DEPT_USE_YN FROM PROJECT_WATCHER A LEFT OUTER JOIN T2_CODE_DTL C ON A.DIVISION = C.CD_DTL_NO AND C.CD_NO = '200' LEFT OUTER JOIN T2_USERS U ON A.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE A.PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PROJECT_WATCHER ( PRJ_ID, DIVISION, USER_ID, EMAIL ) VALUES (
#{prjId},
(SELECT MAX(PRJ_ID) FROM PROJECT_MASTER),
#{prjDivision}, #{prjUserId}, #{prjEmail} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_DISTRIBUTE_HIS WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
SELECT DISTINCT OSS_NAME FROM OSS_COMMON WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY OSS_NAME

/* ProjectMapper.getOssVersions */ SELECT DISTINCT IF(IFNULL(A.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', 'N/A', A.OSS_VERSION) AS OSS_VERSION FROM ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OC.SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OV.USE_YN, OV.VULN_CPE_NM, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.CVE_ID, OV.VULN_YN, OV.VULN_RECHECK, OV.VULN_DATE, OV.LICENSE_TYPE, OV.OBLIGATION_TYPE, OV.COPYRIGHT, OV.ATTRIBUTION, OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, OV.CREATOR, OV.CREATED_DATE, OV.MODIFIER, OV.MODIFIED_DATE FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_NICKNAME B ON A.OSS_COMMON_ID = B.OSS_COMMON_ID WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND (A.OSS_NAME = #{ossName} OR B.OSS_NICKNAME = #{ossName}) ORDER BY A.OSS_VERSION

SELECT A.OSS_ID , A.LICENSE_DIV , A.HOMEPAGE , A.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION , A.VULN_YN , A.CVE_ID , A.CVSS_SCORE , A.COPYRIGHT AS COPYRIGHT_TEXT FROM ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OC.SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OV.USE_YN, OV.VULN_CPE_NM, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.CVE_ID, OV.VULN_YN, OV.VULN_RECHECK, OV.VULN_DATE, OV.LICENSE_TYPE, OV.OBLIGATION_TYPE, OV.COPYRIGHT, OV.ATTRIBUTION, OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, OV.CREATOR, OV.CREATED_DATE, OV.MODIFIER, OV.MODIFIED_DATE FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND IFNULL(A.OSS_VERSION, '') = #{ossVersion} AND (A.OSS_NAME = #{ossName} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM OSS_NICKNAME B WHERE A.OSS_COMMON_ID = B.OSS_COMMON_ID AND B.OSS_NICKNAME = #{ossName}) )

SELECT A.OSS_ID , A.LICENSE_DIV , A.HOMEPAGE , A.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION , A.VULN_YN , A.CVE_ID , A.CVSS_SCORE , A.COPYRIGHT AS COPYRIGHT_TEXT FROM ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OC.SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OV.USE_YN, OV.VULN_CPE_NM, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.CVE_ID, OV.VULN_YN, OV.VULN_RECHECK, OV.VULN_DATE, OV.LICENSE_TYPE, OV.OBLIGATION_TYPE, OV.COPYRIGHT, OV.ATTRIBUTION, OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, OV.CREATOR, OV.CREATED_DATE, OV.MODIFIER, OV.MODIFIED_DATE FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEACTIVATE_FLAG = 'N' AND A.OSS_VERSION = #{ossVersion} AND (A.OSS_NAME = #{ossName} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM OSS_NICKNAME B WHERE A.OSS_COMMON_ID = B.OSS_COMMON_ID AND B.OSS_NICKNAME = #{ossName}) )

SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OV.VULN_YN, OV.CVE_ID, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.COPYRIGHT AS COPYRIGHT_TEXT FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID WHERE OV.USE_YN = 'Y' AND OV.OSS_VERSION = #{ossVersion} AND IFNULL(OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, 'N') = 'N' AND OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{downloadLocation})
UNION
SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OC.HOMEPAGE, DOWN.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OV.VULN_YN, OV.CVE_ID, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.COPYRIGHT AS COPYRIGHT_TEXT FROM ( SELECT OSS_COMMON_ID, DOWNLOAD_LOCATION FROM OSS_DOWNLOADLOCATION WHERE DOWNLOAD_LOCATION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{downloadLocation}) ) DOWN INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON DOWN.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID WHERE OV.USE_YN = 'Y' AND OV.OSS_VERSION = #{ossVersion} AND IFNULL(OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OV.VULN_YN, OV.CVE_ID, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.COPYRIGHT AS COPYRIGHT_TEXT, B.VERSION_DIFF_FLAG FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID INNER JOIN OSS_MASTER_LICENSE_FLAG B ON OV.OSS_ID = B.OSS_ID WHERE OV.USE_YN = 'Y' AND IFNULL(OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, 'N') = 'N' AND OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{downloadLocation})
UNION
SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OC.HOMEPAGE, DOWN.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OV.VULN_YN, OV.CVE_ID, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.COPYRIGHT AS COPYRIGHT_TEXT, B.VERSION_DIFF_FLAG FROM ( SELECT OSS_COMMON_ID, DOWNLOAD_LOCATION FROM OSS_DOWNLOADLOCATION WHERE DOWNLOAD_LOCATION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{downloadLocation}) ) DOWN INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON DOWN.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID INNER JOIN OSS_MASTER_LICENSE_FLAG B ON OV.OSS_ID = B.OSS_ID WHERE OV.USE_YN = 'Y' AND IFNULL(OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, 'N') = 'N'

/* ProjectMapper.getLicenses */ SELECT T1.LICENSE_ID, T1.OSS_LICENSE_COMB, T1.OSS_COPYRIGHT, CASE WHEN IFNULL(SHORT_IDENTIFIER, '') = '' THEN T2.LICENSE_NAME ELSE T2.SHORT_IDENTIFIER END AS LICENSE_NAME , T2.LICENSE_TEXT, T2.LICENSE_TYPE FROM OSS_LICENSE_DECLARED T1 INNER JOIN LICENSE_MASTER T2 ON T1.LICENSE_ID = T2.LICENSE_ID WHERE T1.OSS_ID = #{ossId} ORDER BY OSS_LICENSE_IDX

SELECT T2.CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_USERS T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM T2_CODE_DTL S WHERE S.CD_NO = '200' AND S.USE_YN = 'Y') T2 ON T1.DIVISION = T2.CD_DTL_NO WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T1.USER_ID = #{creator}

SELECT * FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE
#{_componentId}
SELECT MAX(COMPONENT_ID) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS

/* getProjectDIvisionList : PROJECT DIVISION AUTO COMPLETE */ SELECT DISTINCT T2.CD_DTL_NM AS PRJ_DIVISION FROM T2_USERS T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM T2_CODE_DTL S WHERE S.CD_NO = '200' AND S.USE_YN = 'Y') T2 ON T1.DIVISION = T2.CD_DTL_NO WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROJECT_MASTER
DEP_CSV_FILE_ID = #{depCsvFileId},
SRC_CSV_FILE_ID = #{srcCsvFileId},
BIN_CSV_FILE_ID = #{binCsvFileId},
BIN_BINARY_FILE_ID = #{binBinaryFileId},
SRC_ANDROID_CSV_FILE_ID = #{srcAndroidCsvFileId},
SRC_ANDROID_NOTICE_FILE_ID = #{srcAndroidNoticeFileId},
SRC_ANDROID_NOTICE_XML_ID = #{srcAndroidNoticeXmlId},
SRC_ANDROID_RESULT_FILE_ID = #{srcAndroidResultFileId}
SCRT_CSV_FILE_ID = #{scrtCsvFileId}
WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}

UPDATE PROJECT_MASTER
DEP_CSV_FILE_ID = null,
SRC_CSV_FILE_ID = null,
BIN_CSV_FILE_ID = null,
BIN_BINARY_FILE_ID = null,
SRC_ANDROID_CSV_FILE_ID = null,
SRC_ANDROID_NOTICE_FILE_ID = null,
SRC_ANDROID_NOTICE_XML_ID = null,
SRC_ANDROID_RESULT_FILE_ID = null,
WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
mapper.select: SELECT T1.* , DATE_FORMAT(T1.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATED_DATE FROM T2_FILE T1 WHERE T1.FILE_ID = #{csvFileId} AND T1.DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT T1.* , DATE_FORMAT(T1.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATED_DATE FROM T2_FILE T1 WHERE T1.FILE_ID = #{srcAndroidCsvFileId} ORDER BY T1.FILE_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT T1.* , DATE_FORMAT(T1.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATED_DATE FROM T2_FILE T1 WHERE T1.FILE_ID = #{srcAndroidResultFileId} ORDER BY T1.FILE_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT T1.* , DATE_FORMAT(T1.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATED_DATE FROM T2_FILE T1 WHERE T1.FILE_ID = #{fileId} ORDER BY T1.FILE_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT OSS_LICENSE_COMB FROM OSS_LICENSE_DECLARED WHERE OSS_ID = #{ossId} AND LICENSE_ID = #{licenseId}
mapper.update: UPDATE PROJECT_MASTER SET COMMENT = '' WHERE PRJ_ID = #{referenceId}
mapper.select:
/* ProjectMapper selectBomList */ SELECT
CONCAT(RTN.REFERENCE_DIV, '-', RTN.OSS_NAME, '-', RTN.OSS_VERSION, '-', RTN.LICENSE_NAME) AS GROUPBY, CONCAT(RTN.REFERENCE_DIV, '-', RTN.OSS_NAME, '-', RTN.OSS_VERSION, '-', RTN.LICENSE_NAME) AS GROUPBY, CONCAT(RTN.REFERENCE_DIV, '-', RTN.REF_DIV, '-', RTN.OSS_NAME, '-', RTN.OSS_VERSION, '-', RTN.LICENSE_NAME) AS GROUPBY, CONCAT(RTN.REFERENCE_DIV, '-', RTN.OSS_NAME, '-', RTN.OSS_VERSION, '-', RTN.LICENSE_NAME) AS GROUPBY,
CASE WHEN RTN.OSS_NAME = '-' THEN RTN.COMPONENT_ID ELSE CONCAT(RTN.OSS_NAME,RTN.OSS_VERSION,RTN.LICENSE_NAME) END AS GROUPING_COLUMN, RTN.COMPONENT_ID, CASE WHEN RTN.REFERENCE_DIV = '14' THEN RTN.COMPONENT_ID ELSE RTN.REF_COMPONENT_ID END AS REF_COMPONENT_ID, RTN.REFERENCE_ID, RTN.REFERENCE_DIV, RTN.COMPONENT_IDX, CASE WHEN RTN.REFERENCE_DIV = '14' THEN RTN.COMPONENT_IDX ELSE (SELECT COMPONENT_IDX FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC1 WHERE OC1.COMPONENT_ID = RTN.REF_COMPONENT_ID) END AS REF_COMPONENT_IDX, RTN.REF_DIV, RTN.OSS_ID, RTN.OSS_NAME, RTN.OSS_VERSION, RTN.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, RTN.HOMEPAGE, RTN.BINARY_NAME, RTN.BINARY_SIZE , RTN.BINARY_NOTICE, RTN.CUSTOM_BINARY_YN, RTN.EXCLUDE_YN, RTN.MERGE_PRE_DIV, RTN.BAT_STRING_MATCH_PERCENTAGE, RTN.BAT_PERCENTAGE, RTN.BAT_SCORE,
RTN.FILE_PATH, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(IFNULL(RTN.FILE_PATH, '') = '', NULL, RTN.FILE_PATH) SEPARATOR '\r\n') AS FILE_PATH,
RTN.OBLIGATION_TYPE,
CASE WHEN IFNULL(RTN.OBLIGATION_TYPE, '') = '' AND IFNULL(RTN.OSS_ID, '') <> '' THEN ( SELECT B1.OBLIGATION_TYPE FROM OSS_VERSION B1 WHERE RTN.OSS_ID = B1.OSS_ID) ELSE RTN.OBLIGATION_TYPE END AS OBLIGATION_TYPE,
RTN.PRE_OBLIGATION_TYPE, RTN.ADMIN_CHECK_YN, CASE WHEN RTN.REFERENCE_DIV = '11' THEN 1 WHEN RTN.REFERENCE_DIV = '15' THEN 2 WHEN RTN.REFERENCE_DIV = '10' THEN 3 WHEN RTN.REFERENCE_DIV = '13' AND RTN.MERGE_PRE_DIV IS NULL THEN 11 WHEN RTN.REFERENCE_DIV = '13' AND RTN.MERGE_PRE_DIV = '11' THEN 12 WHEN RTN.REFERENCE_DIV = '13' AND RTN.MERGE_PRE_DIV = '15' THEN 13 WHEN RTN.REFERENCE_DIV = '13' AND RTN.MERGE_PRE_DIV = '10' THEN 14 WHEN RTN.REFERENCE_DIV = '13' AND RTN.MERGE_PRE_DIV = '16' THEN 15 ELSE 99 END AS MERGE_ORDER, RTN.LICENSE_ID, RTN.LICENSE_NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT RTN.COPYRIGHT SEPARATOR '|') AS COPYRIGHT_TEXT, RTN.LICENSE_TYPE_IDX, RTN.CVSS_SCORE_MAX, RTN.CVSS_SCORE_MAX1, RTN.LICENSE_TYPE, RTN.DEPENDENCIES, RTN.REF_OSS_NAME, RTN.PACKAGE_URL FROM ( SELECT A1.REFERENCE_ID, A1.COMPONENT_ID, A1.REF_COMPONENT_ID, A1.REFERENCE_DIV, A1.COMPONENT_IDX,A1.OSS_ID, A1.OSS_NAME, A1.OSS_VERSION , A1.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, A1.HOMEPAGE, A1.FILE_PATH, A1.BINARY_NOTICE, A1.BINARY_NAME, A1.BINARY_SIZE, A1.CUSTOM_BINARY_YN, A1.EXCLUDE_YN, A1.MERGE_PRE_DIV , A1.BAT_STRING_MATCH_PERCENTAGE, A1.BAT_PERCENTAGE, A1.BAT_SCORE, A1.PRE_OBLIGATION_TYPE, A1.OBLIGATION_TYPE, A1.ADMIN_CHECK_YN, A1.COPYRIGHT , GROUP_CONCAT(A2.LICENSE_ID ORDER BY A2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS LICENSE_ID , GROUP_CONCAT(A2.LICENSE_NAME ORDER BY A2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS LICENSE_NAME , IFNULL(A1.REF_DIV, (SELECT S.REFERENCE_DIV FROM OSS_COMPONENTS S WHERE S.COMPONENT_ID = A1.REF_COMPONENT_ID)) AS REF_DIV , (CASE WHEN GROUP_CONCAT(A3.LICENSE_TYPE) REGEXP 'PMS|WCP|CP' THEN 1 WHEN A3.LICENSE_TYPE IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT(A2.LICENSE_NAME ORDER BY A2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ','), '-', 2) END) AS LICENSE_TYPE_IDX , A3.LICENSE_TYPE, A1.DEPENDENCIES, A1.REF_OSS_NAME, A1.PACKAGE_URL
, CASE WHEN ((SELECT IFNULL(EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE COMPONENT_ID = A1.REF_COMPONENT_ID) != 'Y' AND IFNULL(A1.OSS_NAME, IFNULL(A4.OSS_NAME, '')) != '') THEN
, CASE WHEN IFNULL(A1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' AND IFNULL(A1.OSS_NAME, IFNULL(A4.OSS_NAME, '')) != '' THEN
(
SELECT CONCAT(NVD.PRODUCT,'@',NVD.VERSION,'@',NVD.VENDOR,'@',MAX(CVE.CVSS_SCORE),'@',CVE.CVE_ID) FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN NVD_CVE_V3 CVE ON NVD.CVE_ID = CVE.CVE_ID WHERE NVD.PRODUCT != '-' AND NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(IFNULL(A1.REF_OSS_NAME, IFNULL(A1.OSS_NAME, A4.OSS_NAME)), ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = A1.OSS_VERSION AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT OSS_COMMON_ID, CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CPE23URI, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CPE23URI ELSE CPE23URI END CRITERIA FROM OSS_EXCLUDE_CPE ) TBL WHERE TBL.CRITERIA = CONCAT(NVD.VENDOR, ':', NVD.PRODUCT) AND TBL.OSS_COMMON_ID = A4.OSS_COMMON_ID )
SELECT CONCAT(NVD.PRODUCT,'@',NVD.VERSION,'@',NVD.VENDOR,'@',MAX(NVD.CVSS_SCORE),'@',NVD.CVE_ID) FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD WHERE NVD.PRODUCT != '-' AND NVD.VERSION = '-' AND NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(IFNULL(A1.REF_OSS_NAME, IFNULL(A1.OSS_NAME, A4.OSS_NAME)), ' ', '_') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT OSS_COMMON_ID, CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CPE23URI, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CPE23URI ELSE CPE23URI END CRITERIA FROM OSS_EXCLUDE_CPE ) TBL WHERE TBL.CRITERIA = CONCAT(NVD.VENDOR, ':', NVD.PRODUCT) AND TBL.OSS_COMMON_ID = A4.OSS_COMMON_ID )
) ELSE NULL END CVSS_SCORE_MAX
, CASE WHEN ((SELECT IFNULL(EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE COMPONENT_ID = A1.REF_COMPONENT_ID) != 'Y' AND IFNULL(A1.OSS_NAME, IFNULL(A4.OSS_NAME, '')) != '') THEN
, CASE WHEN IFNULL(A1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' AND IFNULL(A1.OSS_NAME, IFNULL(A4.OSS_NAME, '')) != '' THEN
(
SELECT CONCAT(NVD.PRODUCT,'@',NVD.VERSION,'@',NVD.VENDOR,'@',MAX(CVE.CVSS_SCORE),'@',CVE.CVE_ID) FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN NVD_CVE_V3 CVE ON NVD.CVE_ID = CVE.CVE_ID WHERE NVD.PRODUCT != '-' AND NVD.VERSION = A1.OSS_VERSION
SELECT CONCAT(NVD.PRODUCT,'@',NVD.VERSION,'@',NVD.VENDOR,'@',MAX(NVD.CVSS_SCORE),'@',NVD.CVE_ID) FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD WHERE NVD.PRODUCT != '-' AND NVD.VERSION = '-'
AND NVD.PRODUCT IN ( SELECT REPLACE(NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') FROM ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK WHERE NICK.OSS_NAME = IFNULL(A1.REF_OSS_NAME, IFNULL(A1.OSS_NAME, A4.OSS_NAME))) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT OSS_COMMON_ID, CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CPE23URI, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CPE23URI ELSE CPE23URI END CRITERIA FROM OSS_EXCLUDE_CPE ) TBL WHERE TBL.CRITERIA = CONCAT(NVD.VENDOR, ':', NVD.PRODUCT) AND TBL.OSS_COMMON_ID = A4.OSS_COMMON_ID ) ) ELSE NULL END CVSS_SCORE_MAX1
FROM OSS_COMPONENTS A1 INNER JOIN PROJECT_MASTER PRJ ON A1.REFERENCE_ID = PRJ.PRJ_ID INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE A2 ON A1.COMPONENT_ID = A2.COMPONENT_ID AND A2.EXCLUDE_YN <> 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN LICENSE_MASTER A3 ON A2.LICENSE_ID = A3.LICENSE_ID AND A3.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OC.SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OV.USE_YN, OV.VULN_CPE_NM, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.CVE_ID, OV.VULN_YN, OV.VULN_RECHECK, OV.VULN_DATE, OV.LICENSE_TYPE, OV.OBLIGATION_TYPE, OV.COPYRIGHT, OV.ATTRIBUTION, OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, OV.CREATOR, OV.CREATED_DATE, OV.MODIFIER, OV.MODIFIED_DATE FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) A4 ON A1.OSS_NAME = A4.OSS_NAME AND A1.OSS_VERSION = A4.OSS_VERSION AND A4.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE A1.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId}
AND IFNULL(A1.OSS_VERSION, '') = ''
AND IFNULL(A1.OSS_VERSION, '') != ''
AND A1.OBLIGATION_TYPE IN ('10', '11')
AND A1.REFERENCE_DIV IN ('13', '17') AND IFNULL(A1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N'
AND A1.REFERENCE_DIV IN ('13')
AND IFNULL(A1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND A1.REFERENCE_DIV IN ('10','11','15','16') AND (CASE WHEN PRJ.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_PARTNER = 'N' THEN A1.REFERENCE_DIV <> '10' ELSE TRUE END) AND (CASE WHEN PRJ.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_DEP = 'N' THEN A1.REFERENCE_DIV <> '16' ELSE TRUE END) AND (CASE WHEN PRJ.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_SRC = 'N' THEN A1.REFERENCE_DIV <> '11' ELSE TRUE END) AND (CASE WHEN PRJ.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_BIN = 'N' THEN A1.REFERENCE_DIV <> '15' ELSE TRUE END)
GROUP BY A1.COMPONENT_ID ) RTN
WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY GROUPBY

/* ProjectMapper selectAndroidBomList */ SELECT
CONCAT(RTN.REFERENCE_DIV, '-', RTN.OSS_NAME, '-', RTN.OSS_VERSION, '-', RTN.LICENSE_NAME) AS GROUPBY, CONCAT(RTN.REFERENCE_DIV, '-', RTN.OSS_NAME, '-', RTN.OSS_VERSION, '-', RTN.LICENSE_NAME) AS GROUPBY, CONCAT(RTN.REFERENCE_DIV, '-', RTN.REF_DIV, '-', RTN.OSS_NAME, '-', RTN.OSS_VERSION, '-', RTN.LICENSE_NAME) AS GROUPBY, CONCAT(RTN.REFERENCE_DIV, '-', RTN.OSS_NAME, '-', RTN.OSS_VERSION, '-', RTN.LICENSE_NAME) AS GROUPBY,
CASE WHEN RTN.OSS_NAME = '-' THEN RTN.COMPONENT_ID ELSE CONCAT(RTN.OSS_NAME,RTN.OSS_VERSION,RTN.LICENSE_NAME) END AS GROUPING_COLUMN, RTN.COMPONENT_ID, RTN.REF_COMPONENT_ID, RTN.REFERENCE_ID, RTN.REFERENCE_DIV, RTN.COMPONENT_IDX, (SELECT COMPONENT_IDX FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC1 WHERE OC1.COMPONENT_ID = RTN.REF_COMPONENT_ID) AS REF_COMPONENT_IDX, RTN.REF_DIV, RTN.OSS_ID, RTN.OSS_NAME, RTN.OSS_VERSION, RTN.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, RTN.HOMEPAGE, RTN.BINARY_NAME, RTN.BINARY_SIZE , RTN.BINARY_NOTICE, RTN.CUSTOM_BINARY_YN, RTN.EXCLUDE_YN, RTN.MERGE_PRE_DIV, RTN.BAT_STRING_MATCH_PERCENTAGE, RTN.BAT_PERCENTAGE, RTN.BAT_SCORE,
RTN.FILE_PATH, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(IFNULL(RTN.FILE_PATH, '') = '', NULL, RTN.FILE_PATH) SEPARATOR '\r\n') AS FILE_PATH,
RTN.OBLIGATION_TYPE,
CASE WHEN IFNULL(RTN.OBLIGATION_TYPE, '') = '' AND IFNULL(RTN.OSS_ID, '') <> '' THEN ( SELECT B1.OBLIGATION_TYPE FROM OSS_VERSION B1 WHERE RTN.OSS_ID = B1.OSS_ID) ELSE RTN.OBLIGATION_TYPE END AS OBLIGATION_TYPE,
RTN.PRE_OBLIGATION_TYPE, RTN.ADMIN_CHECK_YN, RTN.LICENSE_ID, RTN.LICENSE_NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT RTN.COPYRIGHT SEPARATOR '|') AS COPYRIGHT_TEXT, RTN.LICENSE_TYPE_IDX, RTN.CVSS_SCORE_MAX, RTN.CVSS_SCORE_MAX1, RTN.LICENSE_TYPE, RTN.DEPENDENCIES, RTN.REF_OSS_NAME, RTN.PACKAGE_URL FROM ( SELECT A1.REFERENCE_ID, A1.COMPONENT_ID, A1.REF_COMPONENT_ID, A1.REFERENCE_DIV, A1.COMPONENT_IDX,A1.OSS_ID, A1.OSS_NAME, A1.OSS_VERSION , A1.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, A1.HOMEPAGE, A1.FILE_PATH, A1.BINARY_NOTICE, A1.BINARY_NAME, A1.BINARY_SIZE, A1.CUSTOM_BINARY_YN, A1.EXCLUDE_YN, A1.MERGE_PRE_DIV , A1.BAT_STRING_MATCH_PERCENTAGE, A1.BAT_PERCENTAGE, A1.BAT_SCORE, A1.PRE_OBLIGATION_TYPE, A1.OBLIGATION_TYPE, A1.ADMIN_CHECK_YN, A1.COPYRIGHT , GROUP_CONCAT(A2.LICENSE_ID ORDER BY A2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS LICENSE_ID , GROUP_CONCAT(A2.LICENSE_NAME ORDER BY A2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS LICENSE_NAME , IFNULL(A1.REF_DIV, (SELECT S.REFERENCE_DIV FROM OSS_COMPONENTS S WHERE S.COMPONENT_ID = A1.REF_COMPONENT_ID)) AS REF_DIV , (CASE WHEN GROUP_CONCAT(A3.LICENSE_TYPE) REGEXP 'PMS|WCP|CP' THEN 1 WHEN A3.LICENSE_TYPE IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT(A2.LICENSE_NAME ORDER BY A2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ','), '-', 2) END) AS LICENSE_TYPE_IDX , A3.LICENSE_TYPE, A1.DEPENDENCIES, A1.REF_OSS_NAME, A1.PACKAGE_URL
, CASE WHEN ((SELECT IFNULL(EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE COMPONENT_ID = A1.REF_COMPONENT_ID) != 'Y') THEN
, CASE WHEN IFNULL(A1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' THEN
(
SELECT CONCAT(NVD.PRODUCT,'@',NVD.VERSION,'@',NVD.VENDOR,'@',MAX(CVE.CVSS_SCORE),'@',CVE.CVE_ID) FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN NVD_CVE_V3 CVE ON NVD.CVE_ID = CVE.CVE_ID WHERE NVD.PRODUCT != '-' AND NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(IFNULL(A1.REF_OSS_NAME, IFNULL(A1.OSS_NAME, A4.OSS_NAME)), ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = A1.OSS_VERSION
SELECT CONCAT(NVD.PRODUCT,'@',NVD.VERSION,'@',NVD.VENDOR,'@',MAX(NVD.CVSS_SCORE),'@',NVD.CVE_ID) FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD WHERE NVD.PRODUCT != '-' AND NVD.VERSION = '-' AND NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(IFNULL(A1.REF_OSS_NAME, IFNULL(A1.OSS_NAME, A4.OSS_NAME)), ' ', '_')
) ELSE NULL END CVSS_SCORE_MAX
, CASE WHEN ((SELECT IFNULL(EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE COMPONENT_ID = A1.REF_COMPONENT_ID) != 'Y') THEN
, CASE WHEN IFNULL(A1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' THEN
(
SELECT CONCAT(NVD.PRODUCT,'@',NVD.VERSION,'@',NVD.VENDOR,'@',MAX(CVE.CVSS_SCORE),'@',CVE.CVE_ID) FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN NVD_CVE_V3 CVE ON NVD.CVE_ID = CVE.CVE_ID WHERE NVD.PRODUCT != '-' AND NVD.VERSION = A1.OSS_VERSION
SELECT CONCAT(NVD.PRODUCT,'@',NVD.VERSION,'@',NVD.VENDOR,'@',MAX(NVD.CVSS_SCORE),'@',NVD.CVE_ID) FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD WHERE NVD.PRODUCT != '-' AND NVD.VERSION = '-'
AND NVD.PRODUCT IN ( SELECT REPLACE(NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') FROM ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK WHERE NICK.OSS_NAME = IFNULL(A1.REF_OSS_NAME, IFNULL(A1.OSS_NAME, A4.OSS_NAME))) ) ELSE NULL END CVSS_SCORE_MAX1 FROM OSS_COMPONENTS A1 INNER JOIN PROJECT_MASTER PRJ ON A1.REFERENCE_ID = PRJ.PRJ_ID INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE A2 ON A1.COMPONENT_ID = A2.COMPONENT_ID AND A2.EXCLUDE_YN <> 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN LICENSE_MASTER A3 ON A2.LICENSE_ID = A3.LICENSE_ID AND A3.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OC.SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OV.USE_YN, OV.VULN_CPE_NM, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.CVE_ID, OV.VULN_YN, OV.VULN_RECHECK, OV.VULN_DATE, OV.LICENSE_TYPE, OV.OBLIGATION_TYPE, OV.COPYRIGHT, OV.ATTRIBUTION, OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, OV.CREATOR, OV.CREATED_DATE, OV.MODIFIER, OV.MODIFIED_DATE FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) A4 ON A1.OSS_NAME = A4.OSS_NAME AND A1.OSS_VERSION = A4.OSS_VERSION AND A4.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE A1.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId}
AND IFNULL(A1.OSS_VERSION, '') = ''
AND IFNULL(A1.OSS_VERSION, '') != ''
AND A1.OBLIGATION_TYPE IN ('10', '11')
AND A1.REFERENCE_DIV = '17' AND IFNULL(A1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N'
AND IFNULL(A1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND A1.REFERENCE_DIV = '14' AND (CASE WHEN PRJ.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_ANDROID = 'N' THEN A1.REFERENCE_DIV <> '14' ELSE TRUE END)
GROUP BY A1.COMPONENT_ID ) RTN
WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY GROUPBY
SELECT * FROM OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE WHERE COMPONENT_ID = #{componentId} AND IFNULL(EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y'

SELECT OCL.* FROM OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE OCL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId}
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('10', '11', '13', '15', '16')
AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('14', '17')
AND COMPONENT_ID = OCL.COMPONENT_ID) AND IFNULL(OCL.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y'
SELECT * FROM OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE A WHERE A.COMPONENT_ID IN ( SELECT S.COMPONENT_ID FROM OSS_COMPONENTS S WHERE S.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} ) AND IFNULL(A.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y'

SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,A.PRJ_NAME ,A.PRJ_VERSION ,A.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE ,A.OSS_NOTICE_DUE_DATE ,A.COMMENT ,A.OS_TYPE ,A.OS_TYPE_ETC ,A.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS ,A.VERIFICATION_STATUS ,A.DESTRIBUTION_STATUS ,A.DISTRIBUTE_MASTER_CATEGORY ,A.DISTRIBUTE_NAME ,A.DISTRIBUTE_SOFTWARE_TYPE ,A.DISTRIBUTE_DEPLOY_YN ,A.DISTRIBUTE_DEPLOY_TIME ,A.SRC_CSV_FILE_ID ,A.SRC_ANDROID_CSV_FILE_ID ,A.SRC_ANDROID_NOTICE_FILE_ID ,A.SRC_ANDROID_NOTICE_XML_ID ,A.PACKAGE_FILE_ID ,A.NOTICE_FILE_ID ,A.COMPLETE_YN ,A.REVIEWER ,A.USE_YN ,A.CREATOR ,A.CREATED_DATE ,A.MODIFIER ,A.MODIFIED_DATE ,A.DIVISION , CASE WHEN A.COMPLETE_YN = 'Y' THEN 'COMP' WHEN A.DROP_YN = 'Y' THEN 'DROP' WHEN A.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'REV' OR A.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'REV' THEN 'REV' WHEN A.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'REQ' OR A.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'REQ' THEN 'REQ' WHEN T1.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND T1.DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'DONE' THEN 'REV' WHEN T1.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND T1.DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'NA' THEN 'REV' WHEN T1.IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'NA' AND T1.DESTRIBUTION_STATUS = 'NA' THEN 'REV' ELSE 'PROG' END STATUS , A.PRIORITY FROM PROJECT_MASTER A
WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
AND A.PRJ_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prjName},'%')
AND A.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE = #{distributionType}
AND T1.NETWORK_SERVER_TYPE = #{networkServerType}
AND A.CREATED_DATE >= #{schStartDate}
AND A.CREATED_DATE <= #{schEndDate}
AND A.CREATOR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{creator},'%')
AND A.REVIEWER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reviewer},'%')
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM OSS_COMPONENTS X LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE Y ON X.COMPONENT_ID = Y.COMPONENT_ID WHERE A.PRJ_ID = X.REFERENCE_ID
AND X.OSS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ossName},'%')
AND Y.LICENSE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{licenseName},'%'))
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PROJECT_MODEL M WHERE A.PRJ_ID = M.PRJ_ID AND MODEL_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{modelName},'%'))
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM T2_CODE_DTL S WHERE S.CD_NO ='200' AND S.USE_YN ='Y' AND S.CD_DTL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{prjDivision}, '%') AND A.DIVISION = S.CD_DTL_NO)
AND
A.STATUS = #{item}
AND A.PRIORITY = #{priority}
ORDER BY A.PRJ_ID ASC
ORDER BY A.PRJ_ID DESC
ORDER BY A.PRJ_NAME ASC
ORDER BY A.PRJ_NAME DESC
ORDER BY A.PRJ_VERSION ASC
ORDER BY A.PRJ_VERSION DESC
ORDER BY A.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE ASC
ORDER BY A.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE DESC
ORDER BY A.DIVISION ASC
ORDER BY A.DIVISION DESC
ORDER BY A.CREATOR ASC
ORDER BY A.CREATOR DESC
ORDER BY A.CREATED_DATE ASC
ORDER BY A.CREATED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY A.REVIEWER ASC
ORDER BY A.REVIEWER DESC
ORDER BY A.COMMENT ASC
ORDER BY A.COMMENT DESC
SELECT MAX(PRJ_ID) FROM PROJECT_MASTER
SELECT * FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{oldId} AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('10', '11', '12', '14', '15', '16') ORDER BY COMPONENT_ID
mapper.update: /* ProjectMapper.updateProjectStatusWithComplete */ UPDATE PROJECT_MASTER T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT PM.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID, CASE WHEN ( IFNULL(PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_PARTNER, '') = '' AND IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_DIV = '10' AND OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID), 0) = 0 ) THEN 'N' WHEN ( IFNULL(PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_SRC, 'Y') <> 'N' AND IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_DIV = '10' AND OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID), 0) > 0 ) THEN 'Y' ELSE PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_PARTNER END AS IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_PARTNER, CASE WHEN ( IFNULL(PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_DEP, '') = '' AND IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_DIV = '16' AND OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID), 0) = 0 ) THEN 'N' WHEN ( IFNULL(PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_DEP, 'Y') <> 'N' AND IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_DIV = '16' AND OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID), 0) > 0 ) THEN 'Y' ELSE PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_DEP END AS IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_DEP, CASE WHEN ( IFNULL(PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_SRC, '') = '' AND IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_DIV = '11' AND OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID), 0) = 0 ) THEN 'N' WHEN ( IFNULL(PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_SRC, 'Y') <> 'N' AND IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_DIV = '11' AND OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID), 0) > 0 ) THEN 'Y' ELSE PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_SRC END AS IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_SRC, CASE WHEN ( IFNULL(PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_BAT, '') = '' AND IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_DIV = '12' AND OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID), 0) = 0 ) THEN 'N' WHEN ( IFNULL(PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_SRC, 'Y') <> 'N' AND IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_DIV = '12' AND OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID), 0) > 0 ) THEN 'Y' ELSE PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_BAT END AS IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_BAT, CASE WHEN ( IFNULL(PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_BIN, '') = '' AND IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_DIV = '15' AND OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID), 0) = 0 ) THEN 'N' WHEN ( IFNULL(PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_SRC, 'Y') <> 'N' AND IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_DIV = '15' AND OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID), 0) > 0 ) THEN 'Y' ELSE PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_BIN END AS IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_BIN, CASE WHEN ( IFNULL(PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_ANDROID, '') = '' AND IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_DIV = '14' AND OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID), 0) = 0 ) THEN 'N' WHEN ( IFNULL(PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_SRC, 'Y') <> 'N' AND IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_DIV = '14' AND OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID), 0) > 0 ) THEN 'Y' ELSE PM.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_ANDROID END AS IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_ANDROID FROM PROJECT_MASTER PM WHERE PM.PRJ_ID = #{prjId} ) T2 ON T1.PRJ_ID = T2.PRJ_ID SET T1.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_PARTNER = T2.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_PARTNER, T1.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_DEP = T2.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_DEP, T1.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_SRC = T2.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_SRC, T1.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_BAT = T2.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_BAT, T1.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_BIN = T2.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_BIN, T1.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_ANDROID = T2.IDENTIFICATION_SUB_STATUS_ANDROID WHERE T1.PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE WHERE COMPONENT_ID = #{componentId} ORDER BY COMPONENT_LICENSE_ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROJECT_MASTER SET EXCEPT_FILE_CONTENT = #{exceptFileContent}, VERIFY_FILE_CONTENT = #{verifyFileContent}, BINARY_FILE_YN = #{binaryFileYn}
WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
mapper.select: SELECT LICENSE_ID FROM LICENSE_MASTER WHERE LICENSE_NAME = #{licenseName} LIMIT 1

/* ProjectMapper selectIdentificationGridList */ SELECT M.COMPONENT_ID AS GRID_ID, M.COMPONENT_ID, M.REFERENCE_ID, M.REFERENCE_DIV,
M.COMPONENT_IDX,
IFNULL(M.OSS_ID, '') AS OSS_ID, IFNULL(M.OSS_NAME, '') AS OSS_NAME, IFNULL(M.OSS_VERSION, '') AS OSS_VERSION,
IFNULL(M.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, '') AS DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, IFNULL((SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(D.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION SEPARATOR ',') FROM OSS_DOWNLOADLOCATION D WHERE D.OSS_ID = M.OSS_ID ), M.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION) AS DOWNLOAD_LOCATION,
IFNULL(M.HOMEPAGE, '') AS HOMEPAGE, IFNULL(M.FILE_PATH, '') AS FILE_PATH, IFNULL(M.PACKAGE_URL, '') AS PACKAGE_URL,
IF(M.BINARY_NAME IS NOT NULL AND M.BINARY_NAME != '', M.BINARY_NAME, M.FILE_PATH) AS BINARY_NAME, IFNULL(M.BINARY_NAME, '') AS BINARY_NAME,
IFNULL(M.BINARY_SIZE, '') AS BINARY_SIZE, IFNULL(M.BINARY_NOTICE, '') AS BINARY_NOTICE, IFNULL(M.CUSTOM_BINARY_YN, 'N') AS CUSTOM_BINARY_YN, IFNULL(M.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') AS EXCLUDE_YN, IFNULL(M.COPYRIGHT, '') AS COPYRIGHT_TEXT, M.BAT_STRING_MATCH_PERCENTAGE, M.BAT_PERCENTAGE, M.BAT_SCORE, M.BAT_CHECKSUM, IFNULL(L1.LICENSE_DIV, 'S') AS LICENSE_DIV, M.COMMENTS, M.REF_PARTNER_ID, M.OBLIGATION_TYPE, M.DEPENDENCIES, CASE WHEN IFNULL(M.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' AND M.OSS_NAME != '' AND M.OSS_NAME != '-' THEN (
SELECT CONCAT(NVD.PRODUCT,'@',NVD.VERSION,'@',NVD.VENDOR,'@',MAX(CVE.CVSS_SCORE),'@',CVE.CVE_ID) FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN NVD_CVE_V3 CVE ON NVD.CVE_ID = CVE.CVE_ID WHERE NVD.PRODUCT != '-' AND NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(IFNULL(M.REF_OSS_NAME, IFNULL(L1.OSS_NAME, M.OSS_NAME)), ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = M.OSS_VERSION AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT OSS_COMMON_ID, CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CPE23URI, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CPE23URI ELSE CPE23URI END CRITERIA FROM OSS_EXCLUDE_CPE ) TBL WHERE TBL.CRITERIA = CONCAT(NVD.VENDOR, ':', NVD.PRODUCT) AND TBL.OSS_COMMON_ID = L1.OSS_COMMON_ID )
SELECT CONCAT(NVD.PRODUCT,'@',NVD.VERSION,'@',NVD.VENDOR,'@',MAX(NVD.CVSS_SCORE),'@',NVD.CVE_ID) FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD WHERE NVD.PRODUCT != '-' AND NVD.VERSION = '-' AND NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(IFNULL(M.REF_OSS_NAME, IFNULL(L1.OSS_NAME, M.OSS_NAME)), ' ', '_') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT OSS_COMMON_ID, CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CPE23URI, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CPE23URI ELSE CPE23URI END CRITERIA FROM OSS_EXCLUDE_CPE ) TBL WHERE TBL.CRITERIA = CONCAT(NVD.VENDOR, ':', NVD.PRODUCT) AND TBL.OSS_COMMON_ID = L1.OSS_COMMON_ID )
) ELSE NULL END CVSS_SCORE_MAX, CASE WHEN IFNULL(M.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' AND M.OSS_NAME != '' AND M.OSS_NAME != '-' THEN (
SELECT CONCAT(NVD.PRODUCT,'@',NVD.VERSION,'@',NVD.VENDOR,'@',MAX(CVE.CVSS_SCORE),'@',CVE.CVE_ID) FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN NVD_CVE_V3 CVE ON NVD.CVE_ID = CVE.CVE_ID WHERE NVD.PRODUCT != '-' AND NVD.VERSION = M.OSS_VERSION
SELECT CONCAT(NVD.PRODUCT,'@',NVD.VERSION,'@',NVD.VENDOR,'@',MAX(NVD.CVSS_SCORE),'@',NVD.CVE_ID) FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD WHERE NVD.PRODUCT != '-' AND NVD.VERSION = '-'
AND NVD.PRODUCT IN ( SELECT REPLACE(NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') FROM ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK WHERE NICK.OSS_NAME = IFNULL(M.REF_OSS_NAME, IFNULL(L1.OSS_NAME, M.OSS_NAME))) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT OSS_COMMON_ID, CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CPE23URI, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CPE23URI ELSE CPE23URI END CRITERIA FROM OSS_EXCLUDE_CPE ) TBL WHERE TBL.CRITERIA = CONCAT(NVD.VENDOR, ':', NVD.PRODUCT) AND TBL.OSS_COMMON_ID = L1.OSS_COMMON_ID ) ) ELSE NULL END CVSS_SCORE_MAX1
, BAR.GUIREPORT_FLAG
, M.REF_OSS_NAME
, M.TLSH, M.CHECK_SUM
FROM OSS_COMPONENTS M LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OC.SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OV.USE_YN, OV.VULN_CPE_NM, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.CVE_ID, OV.VULN_YN, OV.VULN_RECHECK, OV.VULN_DATE, OV.LICENSE_TYPE, OV.OBLIGATION_TYPE, OV.COPYRIGHT, OV.ATTRIBUTION, OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, OV.CREATOR, OV.CREATED_DATE, OV.MODIFIER, OV.MODIFIED_DATE FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) L1 ON M.OSS_NAME = L1.OSS_NAME AND M.OSS_VERSION = L1.OSS_VERSION AND L1.USE_YN = 'Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BAT_ID, CHECK_SUM, GUIREPORT_FLAG FROM BINARY_ANALYSIS_RESULT WHERE BAT_ID = #{refBatId} GROUP BY CHECK_SUM, GUIREPORT_FLAG ) BAR ON M.REFERENCE_ID = BAR.BAT_ID AND M.BAT_CHECKSUM = BAR.CHECK_SUM
WHERE M.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND M.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId}
AND IFNULL(M.OSS_VERSION, '') = ''
AND IFNULL(M.OSS_VERSION, '') != ''
AND M.COMPONENT_ID = #{componentId}
ORDER BY CONCAT(IFNULL(BINARY_NAME,''), IFNULL(FILE_PATH,'')), (0 + REPLACE(CASE WHEN IFNULL(BAT_PERCENTAGE, '0') = '' THEN '0' ELSE IFNULL(BAT_PERCENTAGE, '0') END , '%', '') ) DESC, COMPONENT_ID

/* ProjectMapper.getPartnerOssList */ SELECT T1.COMPONENT_ID AS GRID_ID , T1.COMPONENT_ID , T1.COMPONENT_IDX /* 2018-08-06 choye 추가 (ETC)*/ , T1.COMPONENT_ID AS REF_COMPONENT_ID , T1.REFERENCE_ID , T1.REFERENCE_DIV , T1.COMPONENT_IDX , T1.OSS_ID , T1.OSS_NAME , T1.OSS_VERSION , T1.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION , T1.HOMEPAGE , T1.FILE_PATH , IF(T1.BINARY_NAME IS NOT NULL AND T1.BINARY_NAME != '', T1.BINARY_NAME, T1.FILE_PATH) AS BINARY_NAME , T1.REF_PARTNER_ID , (SELECT PARTNER_NAME FROM PARTNER_MASTER WHERE PARTNER_ID = IFNULL(T1.REF_PARTNER_ID, T1.REFERENCE_ID)) AS REF_PARTNER_NAME , T1.REF_PRJ_ID , T1.EXCLUDE_YN , GROUP_CONCAT(T2.LICENSE_NAME ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS LICENSE_NAME , GROUP_CONCAT(T2.LICENSE_TEXT ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS LICENSE_TEXT , CASE WHEN IFNULL(T1.COPYRIGHT, '') != '' THEN T1.COPYRIGHT ELSE GROUP_CONCAT(T2.COPYRIGHT_TEXT ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') END COPYRIGHT_TEXT , T3.VULN_YN , T3.CVSS_SCORE , T3.CVE_ID FROM OSS_COMPONENTS T1 LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T2 ON T1.COMPONENT_ID = T2.COMPONENT_ID AND T2.EXCLUDE_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OC.SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OV.USE_YN, OV.VULN_CPE_NM, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.CVE_ID, OV.VULN_YN, OV.VULN_RECHECK, OV.VULN_DATE, OV.LICENSE_TYPE, OV.OBLIGATION_TYPE, OV.COPYRIGHT, OV.ATTRIBUTION, OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, OV.CREATOR, OV.CREATED_DATE, OV.MODIFIER, OV.MODIFIED_DATE FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) T3 ON T1.OSS_NAME = T3.OSS_NAME AND T1.OSS_VERSION = T3.OSS_VERSION AND T3.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE REFERENCE_ID=#{referenceId} AND REFERENCE_DIV=#{referenceDiv} GROUP BY T1.COMPONENT_ID

/* ProjectMapper.getPartnerOssList */ SELECT T1.COMPONENT_ID AS GRID_ID , T1.COMPONENT_ID , T1.COMPONENT_IDX /* 2018-08-06 choye 추가 (ETC)*/ , T1.COMPONENT_ID AS REF_COMPONENT_ID , T1.REFERENCE_ID , T1.REFERENCE_DIV , T1.COMPONENT_IDX , T1.OSS_ID , T1.OSS_NAME , T1.OSS_VERSION , T1.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION , T1.HOMEPAGE , T1.FILE_PATH , IF(T1.BINARY_NAME IS NOT NULL AND T1.BINARY_NAME != '', T1.BINARY_NAME, T1.FILE_PATH) AS BINARY_NAME , T1.REF_PARTNER_ID , (SELECT PARTNER_NAME FROM PARTNER_MASTER WHERE PARTNER_ID = IFNULL(T1.REF_PARTNER_ID, T1.REFERENCE_ID)) AS REF_PARTNER_NAME , T1.REF_PRJ_ID , T1.EXCLUDE_YN , GROUP_CONCAT(T2.LICENSE_NAME ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS LICENSE_NAME , GROUP_CONCAT(T2.LICENSE_TEXT ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS LICENSE_TEXT , CASE WHEN IFNULL(T1.COPYRIGHT, '') != '' THEN T1.COPYRIGHT ELSE GROUP_CONCAT(T2.COPYRIGHT_TEXT ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') END COPYRIGHT_TEXT , T3.VULN_YN , T3.CVSS_SCORE , T3.CVE_ID FROM OSS_COMPONENTS T1 LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T2 ON T1.COMPONENT_ID = T2.COMPONENT_ID AND T2.EXCLUDE_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OC.SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OV.USE_YN, OV.VULN_CPE_NM, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.CVE_ID, OV.VULN_YN, OV.VULN_RECHECK, OV.VULN_DATE, OV.LICENSE_TYPE, OV.OBLIGATION_TYPE, OV.COPYRIGHT, OV.ATTRIBUTION, OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, OV.CREATOR, OV.CREATED_DATE, OV.MODIFIER, OV.MODIFIED_DATE FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) T3 ON T1.OSS_NAME = T3.OSS_NAME AND T1.OSS_VERSION = T3.OSS_VERSION AND T3.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE REFERENCE_ID=#{referenceId} AND REFERENCE_DIV=#{referenceDiv} GROUP BY T1.COMPONENT_ID

/* ProjectMapper.getIdentificationProjectSearch */ SELECT T1.COMPONENT_ID , T1.REFERENCE_ID , T1.REFERENCE_DIV , T1.COMPONENT_IDX , T1.OSS_ID , T1.OSS_NAME , T1.OSS_VERSION , T1.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION , T1.HOMEPAGE , T1.FILE_PATH , GROUP_CONCAT(T2.LICENSE_NAME ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS LICENSE_NAME , GROUP_CONCAT(T2.LICENSE_TEXT ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS LICENSE_TEXT , GROUP_CONCAT(T2.COPYRIGHT_TEXT ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') AS COPYRIGHT_TEXT , T1.BINARY_NAME , CASE WHEN NVD.CVSS_SCORE IS NOT NULL THEN NVD.CVSS_SCORE ELSE IFNULL(NVD1.CVSS_SCORE, 0) END CVSS_SCORE , IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') AS EXCLUDE_YN FROM OSS_COMPONENTS T1 LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T2 ON T1.COMPONENT_ID = T2.COMPONENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PRODUCT, VERSION, CVSS_SCORE, CVE_ID, 'Y' AS VULN_YN FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 ) NVD ON NVD.PRODUCT = T1.OSS_NAME AND NVD.VERSION = IF(IFNULL(T1.OSS_VERSION, '') = '','-', T1.OSS_VERSION) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PRODUCT, VERSION, CVSS_SCORE, CVE_ID, 'Y' AS VULN_YN FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 ) NVD1 ON NVD1.PRODUCT = REPLACE(T1.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD1.VERSION = IF(IFNULL(T1.OSS_VERSION, '') = '','-', T1.OSS_VERSION) WHERE T1.REFERENCE_ID=#{referenceId} AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV=#{referenceDiv} GROUP BY T1.COMPONENT_ID
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.COMPONENT_ID ASC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.COMPONENT_ID DESC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.OSS_NAME ASC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.OSS_NAME DESC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.OSS_VERSION ASC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.OSS_VERSION DESC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION ASC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION DESC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.HOMEPAGE ASC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.HOMEPAGE DESC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, GROUP_CONCAT(T2.LICENSE_NAME ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') ASC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, GROUP_CONCAT(T2.LICENSE_NAME ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') DESC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, GROUP_CONCAT(T2.COPYRIGHT_TEXT ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') ASC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, GROUP_CONCAT(T2.COPYRIGHT_TEXT ORDER BY T2.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ',') DESC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.FILE_PATH ASC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.FILE_PATH DESC
ORDER BY IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') ASC, T1.COMPONENT_IDX DESC
SELECT COMPONENT_ID FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = '10'
SELECT COMPONENT_ID FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = '20'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE( COMPONENT_ID , LICENSE_ID , LICENSE_NAME , LICENSE_TEXT , COPYRIGHT_TEXT ) SELECT #{componentId} , LICENSE_ID , LICENSE_NAME , LICENSE_TEXT , COPYRIGHT_TEXT FROM OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE WHERE COMPONENT_ID = #{lastComponentsId}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT REVIEWER
FROM PROJECT_MASTER
WHERE IFNULL(REVIEWER, '') != ''

SELECT t1.CREATED_DATE , t1.PRJ_ID , t1.PRJ_VERSION , t1.CREATOR , t1.REVIEWER , t1.PRJ_NAME , IF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = t1.PRJ_ID AND REFERENCE_DIV = '13') > 0, 'USED', '') AS OSS FROM PROJECT_MASTER t1 WHERE t1.PRJ_ID = #{parameter}
SELECT * FROM OSS_COMPONENTS t1 LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE t2 ON t1.COMPONENT_ID = t2.COMPONENT_ID WHERE t1.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND t1.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId}
mapper.update: /* ProjectMapper.updatePartnerOssList */ UPDATE OSS_COMPONENTS SET OSS_NAME = #{ossName}, EXCLUDE_YN = #{excludeYn} WHERE COMPONENT_ID = #{componentId};
mapper.insert:
/* ProjectMapper.insertOssComponentsLicenseCopy */ INSERT INTO OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE( COMPONENT_ID , LICENSE_ID , LICENSE_NAME , LICENSE_TEXT , COPYRIGHT_TEXT , EXCLUDE_YN ) SELECT #{componentId} , LICENSE_ID
, IFNULL(NULLIF((SELECT SHORT_IDENTIFIER FROM LICENSE_MASTER WHERE LICENSE_NAME = T1.LICENSE_NAME AND USE_YN = 'Y'), ''), T1.LICENSE_NAME) AS LICENSE_NAME
, LICENSE_NAME
, LICENSE_TEXT , COPYRIGHT_TEXT , EXCLUDE_YN FROM ( SELECT COMPONENT_LICENSE_ID , LICENSE_ID
, IFNULL(NULLIF((SELECT DISTINCT LM.LICENSE_NAME FROM LICENSE_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN LICENSE_MASTER LM ON NICK.LICENSE_ID = LM.LICENSE_ID WHERE NICK.LICENSE_ID = OCL.LICENSE_ID), ''), OCL.LICENSE_NAME) AS LICENSE_NAME
, LICENSE_NAME
, LICENSE_TEXT , COPYRIGHT_TEXT , EXCLUDE_YN FROM OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE OCL WHERE COMPONENT_ID = #{refComponentId}
AND EXCLUDE_YN <> 'Y'
AND LICENSE_ID NOT IN (SELECT LICENSE_ID FROM LICENSE_MASTER WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND IFNULL(OBLIGATION_DISCLOSING_SRC_YN,'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(OBLIGATION_NOTIFICATION_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(OBLIGATION_NEEDS_CHECK_YN,'N') = 'N')
) T1
ORDER BY T1.COMPONENT_LICENSE_ID
mapper.select: /* ProjectMapper.checkChangedIdentification */ SELECT CASE WHEN T1.REFERENCE_DIV = '10' THEN UPPER(CONCAT(T1.REFERENCE_DIV, '|', TRIM(IFNULL(T1.OSS_NAME, '')), '|', TRIM(IFNULL(T1.OSS_VERSION, '')), '|', TRIM(IFNULL(T1.REF_PARTNER_ID, '')), '|', IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N'))) ELSE UPPER(CONCAT(T1.REFERENCE_DIV, '|', TRIM(IFNULL(T1.OSS_NAME, '')), '|', TRIM(IFNULL(T1.OSS_VERSION, '')), '|', TRIM(IFNULL(T2.LICENSE_NAME, '')), '|', IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N'), '|', IFNULL(T2.EXCLUDE_YN , 'N') )) END AS CHANGE_CHECK_KEY FROM OSS_COMPONENTS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T2 ON T1.COMPONENT_ID = T2.COMPONENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OC.SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OV.USE_YN, OV.VULN_CPE_NM, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.CVE_ID, OV.VULN_YN, OV.VULN_RECHECK, OV.VULN_DATE, OV.LICENSE_TYPE, OV.OBLIGATION_TYPE, OV.COPYRIGHT, OV.ATTRIBUTION, OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, OV.CREATOR, OV.CREATED_DATE, OV.MODIFIER, OV.MODIFIED_DATE FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) T3 ON T1.OSS_NAME = T3.OSS_NAME AND T1.OSS_VERSION = T3.OSS_VERSION AND T3.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE T1.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV <> '50'
SELECT NOTICE_TYPE, NOTICE_TYPE_ETC FROM OSS_NOTICE WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}

SELECT T1.COMPONENT_ID, T1.OSS_ID, T2.LICENSE_ID, T2.LICENSE_NAME FROM OSS_COMPONENTS T1 INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T2 ON T1.COMPONENT_ID = T2.COMPONENT_ID AND T2.EXCLUDE_YN <> 'Y' WHERE T1.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND T1.EXCLUDE_YN <> 'Y' AND IFNULL(T1.OSS_ID, '') <> '' AND IFNULL(T1.OSS_NAME, '') <> '' ORDER BY OSS_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE OSS_COMPONENTS SET OSS_ID = NULL WHERE #{_id}
mapper.select: SELECT T1.COMPONENT_ID, T1.BINARY_NAME, T1.OSS_NAME, T1.OSS_VERSION, T1.FILE_PATH, T1.EXCLUDE_YN, T1.BINARY_NOTICE, T1.CUSTOM_BINARY_YN, T1.REFERENCE_ID, T1.REFERENCE_DIV FROM OSS_COMPONENTS T1 INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T2 ON T1.COMPONENT_ID = T2.COMPONENT_ID AND IFNULL(T2.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(T2.LICENSE_NAME, '') = '' WHERE T1.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV = '15' AND IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(T1.BINARY_NAME, '') <> '' AND IFNULL(T1.OSS_NAME, '') = ''

SELECT T1.COMPONENT_ID, T1.REFERENCE_ID, T1.REFERENCE_DIV, T1.BINARY_NAME, T1.OSS_NAME, T1.OSS_VERSION, T1.FILE_PATH, T1.EXCLUDE_YN, T1.BINARY_NOTICE, T1.CUSTOM_BINARY_YN FROM OSS_COMPONENTS T1 INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T2 ON T1.COMPONENT_ID = T2.COMPONENT_ID AND IFNULL(T2.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(T2.LICENSE_NAME, '') = '' WHERE T1.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV = '14' AND IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(T1.BINARY_NAME, '') <> '' AND IFNULL(T1.OSS_NAME, '') = ''
SELECT * FROM OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE WHERE COMPONENT_ID = #{componentId} ORDER BY COMPONENT_LICENSE_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE PROJECT_MASTER SET IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = #{identificationStatus} WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROJECT_WATCHER WHERE EMAIL = #{prjEmail} AND PRJ_ID = #{prjId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROJECT_WATCHER WHERE (PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND DIVISION = #{prjDivision} AND (USER_ID = 'ALL' OR USER_ID = #{prjUserId})) OR (PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND EMAIL = (SELECT EMAIL FROM T2_USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{prjUserId} AND DIVISION = #{prjDivision} LIMIT 1))

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROJECT_WATCHER WAT INNER JOIN T2_USERS USR ON WAT.USER_ID = USR.USER_ID WHERE WAT.PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND WAT.USER_ID = #{prjUserId} AND USR.DIVISION = #{prjDivision} AND WAT.DIVISION != USR.DIVISION
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROJECT_MASTER WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT_WATCHER (PRJ_ID, DIVISION, USER_ID, EMAIL) VALUES (#{prjId}, #{prjDivision}, #{prjUserId}, #{prjEmail})
mapper.update: UPDATE PROJECT_MODEL SET UPD_RELEASE_DATE = 'N' WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}

UPDATE PROJECT_MODEL SET RELEASE_DATE = #{releaseDate}, UPD_RELEASE_DATE = 'Y' WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND CATEGORY = SUBSTR(#{category},1,3) AND SUBCATEGORY = SUBSTR(#{category},4) AND MODEL_NAME = #{modelName}
UPDATE OSS_COMPONENTS SET FILE_PATH = #{filePath} WHERE COMPONENT_ID = #{componentId}
mapper.select:
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS VIEW_YN FROM PROJECT_MASTER T1 WHERE ( T1.CREATOR = #{loginUserName} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PROJECT_WATCHER A1
WHERE A1.PRJ_ID = T1.PRJ_ID AND (A1.USER_ID = #{loginUserName} OR (A1.USER_ID = 'all' AND A1.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{loginUserName}) )) ) ) AND T1.PRJ_ID = #{prjId}

SELECT A.REFERENCE_ID , P.PRJ_NAME , P.PRJ_VERSION , A.COMPONENT_COUNT FROM PROJECT_ADDLIST A INNER JOIN PROJECT_MASTER P ON A.REFERENCE_ID = P.PRJ_ID WHERE A.PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND A.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv}

SELECT CONCAT(TBL.PRODUCT,'@',TBL.VERSION,'@',TBL.VENDOR,'@',CVE.CVSS_SCORE,'@',CVE.CVE_ID) AS CVSS_SCORE_MAX FROM NVD_CVE_V3 CVE INNER JOIN ( SELECT OM.CVE_ID, REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AS PRODUCT, '' AS VENDOR, IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '-') AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OV.CVE_ID FROM OSS_COMMON OC INNER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID WHERE OV.IN_CPE_MATCH_FLAG = 'Y' ) OM ON OC.OSS_NAME = OM.OSS_NAME AND OC.OSS_VERSION = OM.OSS_VERSION WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{commponentDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OM.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.VENDOR, NVD.VERSION FROM ( SELECT CONF.CVE_ID, CONF.PRODUCT, CONF.VENDOR, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONF.CRITERIA , ':', 6), ':', -1) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_CONFIGURATIONS CONF ON CONF.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{commponentDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME, CONF.CRITERIA ) NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '-') AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{commponentDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.VENDOR, NVD.VERSION FROM ( SELECT CONF.CVE_ID, CONF.PRODUCT, CONF.VENDOR, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONF.CRITERIA , ':', 6), ':', -1) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_CONFIGURATIONS CONF ON CONF.PRODUCT = REPLACE(NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{commponentDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, CONF.CRITERIA ) NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME, IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '-') AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{commponentDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.VENDOR, NVD.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{commponentDiv} AND IFNULL(OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OSS_NAME != '-' AND EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.VENDOR, NVD.VERSION
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.VENDOR, NVD.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{commponentDiv} AND IFNULL(OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND OSS_NAME != '-' AND EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = '-' GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.VENDOR
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.VENDOR, NVD.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME , IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{commponentDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.VENDOR, NVD.VERSION
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.VENDOR, NVD.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME, '-' AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{commponentDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = '-' GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.VENDOR ) TBL ON CVE.CVE_ID = TBL.CVE_ID ORDER BY CVE.CVSS_SCORE DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT TBL.CVSS_SCORE_MAX FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(OM.OSS_NAME,'@',OM.OSS_VERSION,'@','-','@',OM.CVSS_SCORE,'@',OM.CVE_ID) AS CVSS_SCORE_MAX FROM ( SELECT (SELECT OSS_NAME FROM OSS_COMMON WHERE OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID) AS OSS_NAME, OV.* FROM OSS_VERSION OV WHERE IFNULL(OV.IN_CPE_MATCH_FLAG, '') != '' ) OM INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{commponentDiv} AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.OSS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND OC.OSS_NAME != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON OM.OSS_NAME = OC.OSS_NAME AND OM.OSS_VERSION = OC.OSS_VERSION ORDER BY OM.CVSS_SCORE DESC LIMIT 5 ) TBL
UNION
SELECT TBL.CVSS_SCORE_MAX FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(OM.OSS_NAME,'@',OM.OSS_VERSION,'@','-','@',OM.CVSS_SCORE,'@',OM.CVE_ID) AS CVSS_SCORE_MAX FROM ( SELECT (SELECT OSS_NAME FROM OSS_COMMON WHERE OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID) AS OSS_NAME, OV.* FROM OSS_VERSION OV WHERE IFNULL(OV.IN_CPE_MATCH_FLAG, '') != '' ) OM INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{commponentDiv} AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.OSS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND OC.OSS_NAME != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND IFNULL(OC.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON OM.OSS_NAME = OC.OSS_NAME AND OM.OSS_VERSION = OC.OSS_VERSION ORDER BY OM.CVSS_SCORE DESC LIMIT 5 ) TBL
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(COMPONENT_IDX), 0) + 1 FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE REFERENCE_ID=#{referenceId} AND REFERENCE_DIV=#{referenceDiv}
SELECT * FROM PROJECT_MASTER WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT T1.PRJ_ID , T1.PRJ_NAME , T1.PRJ_VERSION , (SELECT CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '207' AND CD_DTL_NO = T1.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE) AS DISTRIBUTION_TYPE , T1.CREATOR , T3.USER_NAME , T1.CREATED_DATE , T1.COMMENT , T2.MODEL_NAME , T1.USE_YN , T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS , (SELECT ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE WHERE FILE_SEQ = T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID) AS ORIG_NM1 , (SELECT ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE WHERE FILE_SEQ = T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID2) AS ORIG_NM2 , (SELECT ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE WHERE FILE_SEQ = T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID3) AS ORIG_NM3 , (SELECT ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE WHERE FILE_SEQ = T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID4) AS ORIG_NM4 FROM PROJECT_MASTER T1 LEFT JOIN PROJECT_MODEL T2 ON T1.PRJ_ID = T2.PRJ_ID INNER JOIN T2_USERS T3 ON T1.CREATOR = T3.USER_ID GROUP BY T1.PRJ_ID) A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF'
AND (A.PRJ_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reuseKeyword},'%') OR A.MODEL_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reuseKeyword},'%') OR A.CREATOR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reuseKeyword},'%') OR A.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reuseKeyword},'%') OR A.ORIG_NM1 = #{reuseKeyword} OR A.ORIG_NM2 = #{reuseKeyword} OR A.ORIG_NM3 = #{reuseKeyword} OR A.ORIG_NM4 = #{reuseKeyword})

SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.PRJ_NAME , A.PRJ_VERSION , A.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE , IFNULL(A.USER_NAME, A.CREATOR) AS CREATOR , A.CREATED_DATE , A.COMMENT FROM (SELECT T1.PRJ_ID , T1.PRJ_NAME , T1.PRJ_VERSION , (SELECT CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '207' AND CD_DTL_NO = T1.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE) AS DISTRIBUTION_TYPE , T1.CREATOR , T3.USER_NAME , T1.CREATED_DATE , T1.COMMENT , T2.MODEL_NAME , T1.USE_YN , T1.VERIFICATION_STATUS , (SELECT ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE WHERE FILE_SEQ = T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID) AS ORIG_NM1 , (SELECT ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE WHERE FILE_SEQ = T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID2) AS ORIG_NM2 , (SELECT ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE WHERE FILE_SEQ = T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID3) AS ORIG_NM3 , (SELECT ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE WHERE FILE_SEQ = T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID4) AS ORIG_NM4 FROM PROJECT_MASTER T1 LEFT JOIN PROJECT_MODEL T2 ON T1.PRJ_ID = T2.PRJ_ID INNER JOIN T2_USERS T3 ON T1.CREATOR = T3.USER_ID GROUP BY T1.PRJ_ID) A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF'
AND (A.PRJ_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reuseKeyword},'%') OR A.MODEL_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reuseKeyword},'%') OR A.CREATOR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reuseKeyword},'%') OR A.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reuseKeyword},'%') OR A.ORIG_NM1 = #{reuseKeyword} OR A.ORIG_NM2 = #{reuseKeyword} OR A.ORIG_NM3 = #{reuseKeyword} OR A.ORIG_NM4 = #{reuseKeyword})
SELECT T2.* FROM PROJECT_MASTER T1 INNER JOIN T2_FILE T2 ON (T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID = T2.FILE_SEQ OR T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID2 = T2.FILE_SEQ OR T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID3 = T2.FILE_SEQ) WHERE T1.PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
SELECT PRJ_ID , STATUS AS OSS_ANALYSIS_STATUS , CREATED_DATE , CREATOR , ANALYSIS_START_DATE , ANALYSIS_END_DATE , MODIFIED_DATE , MODIFIER FROM OSS_ANALYSIS_STATUS WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STATISTICS_MOSTUSED ( PRJ_ID , COMPONENT_NAME , CREATED_DATE , DIV_NO , CHART_TYPE ) SELECT T1.REFERENCE_ID , T1.OSS_NAME AS COMPONENT_NAME , T2.CREATED_DATE , T2.DIVISION AS DIV_NO , 'OSS' AS CHART_TYPE FROM (SELECT REFERENCE_ID , OSS_NAME FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID IN (SELECT PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_MASTER WHERE IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND USE_YN = 'Y') AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('13','14') AND OSS_NAME NOT IN ('','-') AND EXCLUDE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY REFERENCE_ID, OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION) T1 INNER JOIN PROJECT_MASTER T2 ON T1.REFERENCE_ID = T2.PRJ_ID

INSERT INTO STATISTICS_MOSTUSED ( PRJ_ID , COMPONENT_NAME , CREATED_DATE , DIV_NO , CHART_TYPE ) SELECT PM.PRJ_ID , OC.LICENSE_NAME AS COMPONENT_NAME , PM.CREATED_DATE , PM.DIVISION AS DIV_NO , 'LICENSE' AS CHART_TYPE FROM (SELECT T1.REFERENCE_ID , T2.LICENSE_NAME FROM (SELECT COMPONENT_ID , REFERENCE_ID , OSS_NAME , OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS T1 WHERE REFERENCE_ID IN (SELECT PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_MASTER WHERE IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'CONF' AND PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND USE_YN = 'Y') AND REFERENCE_DIV IN ('13','14') AND OSS_NAME NOT IN ('', '-') AND EXCLUDE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY COMPONENT_ID, REFERENCE_ID, OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION) T1 INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T2 ON T1.COMPONENT_ID = T2.COMPONENT_ID AND UPPER(T2.LICENSE_NAME) NOT IN ('', 'LGE PROPRIETARY LICENSE', 'OTHER PROPRIETARY LICENSE') GROUP BY T1.REFERENCE_ID, T1.OSS_NAME, T1.OSS_VERSION, T2.LICENSE_NAME) OC INNER JOIN PROJECT_MASTER PM ON OC.REFERENCE_ID = PM.PRJ_ID
mapper.select: SELECT OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION, REF_COMPONENT_ID FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = '13' AND ADMIN_CHECK_YN = 'Y'

SELECT PM.PRJ_ID , PM.PRJ_NAME , PM.PRJ_VERSION , PM.MODIFIED_DATE FROM PROJECT_MASTER PM INNER JOIN PROJECT_PARTNER_MAP PP ON PM.PRJ_ID = PP.PRJ_ID WHERE PP.PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId}
AND ( PM.CREATOR = #{loginUserName} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PROJECT_WATCHER PW
WHERE PW.PRJ_ID = PM.PRJ_ID AND (PW.USER_ID = #{loginUserName} OR (PW.USER_ID = 'all' AND PW.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{loginUserName}) )) ) )
ORDER BY PM.MODIFIED_DATE DESC LIMIT 100
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROJECT_MASTER SET
IDENTIFICATION_STATUS = 'PROG'
VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'PROG'
WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
mapper.select: SELECT OSS_NAME , OSS_VERSION , CVE_ID , CVSS_SCORE , DATE_FORMAT(PUBL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PUBL_DATE , VULNERABILITY_RESOLUTION , SECURITY_PATCH_LINK , SECURITY_COMMENTS FROM NVD_DATA_SECURITY WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT TBL.CVE_ID FROM ( SELECT NVD.CVE_ID FROM ( SELECT REPLACE(IFNULL(OC.REF_OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_NAME), ' ', '_') AS OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.OSS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND OC.OSS_NAME != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' ) OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.VERSION, NVD.CVE_ID FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE CVSS_SCORE >= #{standardScore} AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID) ) NVD ON OC.OSS_NAME = NVD.PRODUCT AND OC.OSS_VERSION = NVD.VERSION LIMIT 1 ) TBL
UNION
SELECT TBL.* FROM ( SELECT NVD.CVE_ID FROM ( SELECT REPLACE(IFNULL(OC.REF_OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_NAME), ' ', '_') AS OSS_NAME FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.OSS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND OC.OSS_NAME != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND IFNULL(OC.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' ) OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.CVE_ID FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE CVSS_SCORE >= #{standardScore} AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID) ) NVD ON OC.OSS_NAME = NVD.PRODUCT LIMIT 1 ) TBL
UNION
SELECT TBL.* FROM ( SELECT NVD.CVE_ID FROM ( SELECT REPLACE(NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AS OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON IFNULL(OC.REF_OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_NAME) = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.OSS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND OC.OSS_NAME != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' ) OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.VERSION, NVD.CVE_ID FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE CVSS_SCORE >= #{standardScore} AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID) ) NVD ON OC.OSS_NICKNAME = NVD.PRODUCT AND OC.OSS_VERSION = NVD.VERSION LIMIT 1 ) TBL
UNION
SELECT TBL.* FROM ( SELECT NVD.CVE_ID FROM ( SELECT REPLACE(NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AS OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON IFNULL(OC.REF_OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_NAME) = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.OSS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND OC.OSS_NAME != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND IFNULL(OC.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' ) OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT NVD.PRODUCT, NVD.CVE_ID FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE CVSS_SCORE >= #{standardScore} AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID) ) NVD ON OC.OSS_NICKNAME = NVD.PRODUCT LIMIT 1 ) TBL
UNION
SELECT TBL.* FROM ( SELECT NVD.CVE_ID FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(OC.REF_OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_NAME) AS OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.OSS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND OC.OSS_NAME != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' ) OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT NVD.VENDORPRODUCT, NVD.VERSION, NVD.CVE_ID FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE CVSS_SCORE >= #{standardScore} AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID) ) NVD ON OC.OSS_NAME = NVD.VENDORPRODUCT AND OC.OSS_VERSION = NVD.VERSION LIMIT 1 ) TBL
UNION
SELECT TBL.* FROM ( SELECT NVD.CVE_ID FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(OC.REF_OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_NAME) AS OSS_NAME FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.OSS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND OC.OSS_NAME != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND IFNULL(OC.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' ) OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT NVD.VENDORPRODUCT, NVD.CVE_ID FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE CVSS_SCORE >= #{standardScore} AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID) ) NVD ON OC.OSS_NAME = NVD.VENDORPRODUCT LIMIT 1 ) TBL
UNION
SELECT TBL.* FROM ( SELECT NVD.CVE_ID FROM ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON IFNULL(OC.REF_OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_NAME) = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.OSS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND OC.OSS_NAME != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' ) OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT NVD.VENDORPRODUCT, NVD.VERSION, NVD.CVE_ID FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE CVSS_SCORE >= #{standardScore} AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID) ) NVD ON OC.OSS_NICKNAME = NVD.VENDORPRODUCT AND OC.OSS_VERSION = NVD.VERSION LIMIT 1 ) TBL
UNION
SELECT TBL.* FROM ( SELECT NVD.CVE_ID FROM ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON IFNULL(OC.REF_OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_NAME) = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.OSS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND OC.OSS_NAME != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND IFNULL(OC.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') != 'Y' ) OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT NVD.VENDORPRODUCT, NVD.CVE_ID FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NVD_CVE_V3 WHERE CVSS_SCORE >= #{standardScore} AND CVE_ID = NVD.CVE_ID) ) NVD ON OC.OSS_NICKNAME = NVD.VENDORPRODUCT LIMIT 1 ) TBL ) TBL

SELECT T1.PRJ_ID, T1.PRJ_NAME, T1.PRJ_VERSION , T1.DISTRIBUTE_TARGET , T2.COMPONENT_ID, T2.OSS_ID, T2.OSS_NAME, T2.OSS_VERSION , IFNULL(T2.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, T4.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION) AS DOWNLOAD_LOCATION , IFNULL(T2.HOMEPAGE, T4.HOMEPAGE) AS HOMEPAGE , T2.OBLIGATION_TYPE, T4.ATTRIBUTION AS OSS_ATTRIBUTION , IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') AS LICENSE_ID , IF(IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') = '', '', T5.LICENSE_TEXT) AS LICENSE_TEXT , REGEXP_REPLACE((CASE WHEN T2.OSS_NAME = '-' OR T2.ADMIN_CHECK_YN = 'Y' THEN T2.COPYRIGHT ELSE T4.COPYRIGHT END), '$\n', '') AS COPYRIGHT_TEXT , REGEXP_REPLACE((CASE WHEN T2.ADMIN_CHECK_YN = 'Y' THEN NULL ELSE IF(IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') = '', '', T3.COPYRIGHT_TEXT) END), '$\n', '') AS OSS_COPYRIGHT , IF(IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') = '', IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_NAME, ''), IF(IFNULL(T5.SHORT_IDENTIFIER,'') = '', T5.LICENSE_NAME, T5.SHORT_IDENTIFIER)) AS LICENSE_NAME , IF(IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') = '', '', T5.ATTRIBUTION) AS ATTRIBUTION , T2.ADMIN_CHECK_YN , IF(IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') = '', '', T5.LICENSE_TYPE) AS LICENSE_TYPE , T2.PACKAGE_URL FROM PROJECT_MASTER T1 INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS T2 ON T1.PRJ_ID = T2.REFERENCE_ID AND T2.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND T2.OSS_NAME != '-' INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T3 ON T2.COMPONENT_ID = T3.COMPONENT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OC.SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OV.USE_YN, OV.VULN_CPE_NM, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.CVE_ID, OV.VULN_YN, OV.VULN_RECHECK, OV.VULN_DATE, OV.LICENSE_TYPE, OV.OBLIGATION_TYPE, OV.COPYRIGHT, OV.ATTRIBUTION, OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, OV.CREATOR, OV.CREATED_DATE, OV.MODIFIER, OV.MODIFIED_DATE FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) T4 ON T2.OSS_NAME = T4.OSS_NAME AND IFNULL(T2.OSS_VERSION, '') = IFNULL(T4.OSS_VERSION, '') AND T4.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN LICENSE_MASTER T5 ON T3.LICENSE_ID = T5.LICENSE_ID WHERE T1.PRJ_ID = #{referenceId} AND IFNULL(T2.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N' ORDER BY OSS_NAME, LICENSE_NAME

SELECT T1.PRJ_ID, T1.PRJ_NAME, T1.PRJ_VERSION , T1.DISTRIBUTE_TARGET , T2.COMPONENT_ID, T2.OSS_ID, T2.OSS_NAME, T2.OSS_VERSION, T2.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, T2.HOMEPAGE, T2.OBLIGATION_TYPE , IFNULL(T5.LICENSE_ID, '') AS LICENSE_ID , IF(IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') = '', '', T5.LICENSE_TEXT) AS LICENSE_TEXT , IF(IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') = '', '', REGEXP_REPLACE(T3.COPYRIGHT_TEXT, '$\n', '')) AS COPYRIGHT_TEXT , IF(IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') = '', IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_NAME, ''), IF(IFNULL(T5.SHORT_IDENTIFIER,'') = '', T5.LICENSE_NAME, T5.SHORT_IDENTIFIER)) AS LICENSE_NAME , IF(IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') = '', '', T5.ATTRIBUTION) AS ATTRIBUTION , T2.FILE_PATH , IF(IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') = '', '', T5.LICENSE_TYPE) AS LICENSE_TYPE , T2.REF_OSS_NAME FROM PROJECT_MASTER T1 INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS T2 ON T1.PRJ_ID = T2.REFERENCE_ID AND T2.REFERENCE_DIV = '13' AND T2.EXCLUDE_YN = 'N' AND T2.OSS_NAME = '-' INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T3 ON T2.COMPONENT_ID = T3.COMPONENT_ID LEFT JOIN LICENSE_MASTER T5 ON T3.LICENSE_ID = T5.LICENSE_ID WHERE T1.PRJ_ID = #{referenceId} AND IFNULL(T2.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N' ORDER BY LICENSE_NAME

SELECT TBL.OSS_NAME, IF(TBL.VERSION = '-', '', TBL.VERSION) AS OSS_VERSION, CVE.CVSS_SCORE, CVE.CVE_ID, IFNULL(SEC.VULNERABILITY_RESOLUTION, 'Unresolved') AS VULNERABILITY_RESOLUTION FROM NVD_CVE_V3 CVE INNER JOIN ( SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OSS_NAME != '-' AND EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = OC.OSS_NAME AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND OSS_NAME != '-' AND EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = OC.OSS_NAME AND NVD.VERSION = '-' GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME , IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = OC.OSS_NICKNAME AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME, '-' AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = OC.OSS_NICKNAME AND NVD.VERSION = '-' GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' AND NICK.OSS_NICKNAME REGEXP '[-]' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.VENDORPRODUCT = OC.OSS_NICKNAME AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME, '-' AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' AND NICK.OSS_NICKNAME REGEXP '[-]' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.VENDORPRODUCT = OC.OSS_NICKNAME AND NVD.VERSION = '-' GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT OM.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '-') AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OV.CVE_ID FROM OSS_COMMON OC INNER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID WHERE OV.IN_CPE_MATCH_FLAG = 'Y' ) OM ON OC.OSS_NAME = OM.OSS_NAME AND OC.OSS_VERSION = OM.OSS_VERSION WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OM.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION
) TBL ON CVE.CVE_ID = TBL.CVE_ID AND CVE.CVSS_SCORE >= 6.0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM NVD_DATA_SECURITY WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} ) SEC ON TBL.OSS_NAME = SEC.OSS_NAME AND TBL.VERSION = SEC.OSS_VERSION AND TBL.CVE_ID = SEC.CVE_ID ORDER BY TBL.OSS_NAME, TBL.VERSION DESC, CVE.CVSS_SCORE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NVD_DATA_SECURITY WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{copyPrjId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NVD_DATA_SECURITY SELECT #{prjId} , T1.OSS_NAME , T1.OSS_VERSION , T1.CVE_ID , T1.CVSS_SCORE , T1.PUBL_DATE , T1.VULNERABILITY_RESOLUTION , T1.SECURITY_PATCH_LINK , T1.SECURITY_COMMENTS FROM NVD_DATA_SECURITY T1 WHERE T1.REFERENCE_ID = #{copyPrjId}
mapper.select: SELECT T2.OSS_ID , T2.OSS_NAME , T2.OSS_VERSION , T3.LICENSE_ID , IF(IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') = '', T3.LICENSE_NAME, IF(IFNULL(T5.SHORT_IDENTIFIER,'') = '', T5.LICENSE_NAME, T5.SHORT_IDENTIFIER)) AS LICENSE_NAME FROM PROJECT_MASTER T1 INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS T2 ON T1.PRJ_ID = T2.REFERENCE_ID AND T2.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND T2.OSS_NAME != '-' INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T3 ON T2.COMPONENT_ID = T3.COMPONENT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OC.HOMEPAGE, OC.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, OC.SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION, OV.LICENSE_DIV, OV.USE_YN, OV.VULN_CPE_NM, OV.CVSS_SCORE, OV.CVE_ID, OV.VULN_YN, OV.VULN_RECHECK, OV.VULN_DATE, OV.LICENSE_TYPE, OV.OBLIGATION_TYPE, OV.COPYRIGHT, OV.ATTRIBUTION, OC.DEACTIVATE_FLAG, OV.CREATOR, OV.CREATED_DATE, OV.MODIFIER, OV.MODIFIED_DATE FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) T4 ON T2.OSS_NAME = T4.OSS_NAME AND IFNULL(T2.OSS_VERSION, '') = IFNULL(T4.OSS_VERSION, '') AND T4.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN LICENSE_MASTER T5 ON T3.LICENSE_ID = T5.LICENSE_ID WHERE T1.PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND IFNULL(T2.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N'
