SELECT TBL.* , (CASE WHEN GROUP_CONCAT(TBL.LICENSE_TYPE) REGEXP 'PMS|WCP|CP' THEN 1 WHEN TBL.LICENSE_TYPE IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT(TBL.LICENSE_NAME ORDER BY TBL.LICENSE_ID DESC SEPARATOR ','), '-', 2) END) AS LICENSE_TYPE_IDX FROM ( SELECT T2.OSS_ID , T2.OSS_NAME , T2.OSS_VERSION , T3.LICENSE_ID , IF(IFNULL(T3.LICENSE_ID, '') = '', T3.LICENSE_NAME, IF(IFNULL(T5.SHORT_IDENTIFIER,'') = '', T5.LICENSE_NAME, T5.SHORT_IDENTIFIER)) AS LICENSE_NAME , T5.LICENSE_TYPE FROM PROJECT_MASTER T1 INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS T2 ON T1.PRJ_ID = T2.REFERENCE_ID AND T2.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND T2.OSS_NAME != '-' INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T3 ON T2.COMPONENT_ID = T3.COMPONENT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OV.USE_YN FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) T4 ON T2.OSS_NAME = T4.OSS_NAME AND IFNULL(T2.OSS_VERSION, '') = IFNULL(T4.OSS_VERSION, '') AND T4.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN LICENSE_MASTER T5 ON T3.LICENSE_ID = T5.LICENSE_ID WHERE T1.PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND IFNULL(T2.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N' ) TBL GROUP BY TBL.OSS_ID, TBL.OSS_NAME, TBL.OSS_VERSION, TBL.LICENSE_ID, TBL.LICENSE_NAME

SELECT T2.OSS_ID , T2.OSS_NAME , T2.OSS_VERSION , T2.PACKAGE_URL , T2.DEPENDENCIES FROM PROJECT_MASTER T1 INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS T2 ON T1.PRJ_ID = T2.REFERENCE_ID AND T2.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND T2.OSS_NAME != '-' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT OV.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_COMMON_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OV.OSS_VERSION, OV.USE_YN FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_VERSION OV ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = OV.OSS_COMMON_ID ) T3 ON T2.OSS_NAME = T3.OSS_NAME AND IFNULL(T2.OSS_VERSION, '') = IFNULL(T3.OSS_VERSION, '') AND T3.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE T1.PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND IFNULL(T2.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND T2.OSS_NAME != '' AND IFNULL(T2.DEPENDENCIES, '') != ''
SELECT MAX(CVSS_SCORE) AS CVSS_SCORE FROM NVD_DATA_SECURITY WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{prjId} AND VULNERABILITY_RESOLUTION != 'Fixed'

SELECT TBL.OSS_NAME, IF(TBL.VERSION = '-', '', TBL.VERSION) AS OSS_VERSION, CVE.CVSS_SCORE, CVE.CVE_ID, DATE_FORMAT(CVE.PUBL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PUBL_DATE, #{referenceId} AS REFERENCE_ID FROM NVD_CVE_V3 CVE INNER JOIN ( SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OSS_ID, OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OSS_NAME != '-' AND EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION AS VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION, ALIAS.OSS_VERSION_ALIAS AS VERSION FROM ( SELECT OSS_ID, OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OSS_NAME != '-' AND EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OSS_ID, OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION ) OC LEFT JOIN OSS_VERSION_ALIAS ALIAS ON OC.OSS_ID = ALIAS.OSS_ID WHERE ALIAS.OSS_VERSION_ALIAS IS NOT NULL ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND OSS_NAME != '-' AND EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = '-' GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, '-' AS VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION, ALIAS.OSS_VERSION_ALIAS AS VERSION FROM ( SELECT OSS_ID, OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND OSS_NAME != '-' AND EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OSS_ID, OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION ) OC LEFT JOIN OSS_VERSION_ALIAS ALIAS ON OC.OSS_ID = ALIAS.OSS_ID WHERE ALIAS.OSS_VERSION_ALIAS IS NOT NULL ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = '-' GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME , IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION AS VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME , IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS OSS_VERSION , ALIAS.OSS_VERSION_ALIAS AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME LEFT JOIN OSS_VERSION_ALIAS ALIAS ON OC.OSS_ID = ALIAS.OSS_ID WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION, ALIAS.OSS_VERSION_ALIAS ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME, '-' AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = '-' GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' AND NICK.OSS_NICKNAME REGEXP '[-]' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.VENDORPRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME, '-' AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' AND NICK.OSS_NICKNAME REGEXP '[-]' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.VENDORPRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = '-' GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION FROM ( SELECT TBL.* FROM ( SELECT NVD.PRODUCT, CVE.CVE_ID, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(IFNULL(MAT.CPE23URI, NVD.CHK_CRITERIA) , ':', 6), ':', -1) AS VERSION, NVD.CRITERIA FROM ( SELECT CONF.* FROM ( SELECT CONF.MATCH_CRITERIA_ID, CONF.PRODUCT, CONF.VENDOR, CONF.CVE_ID, CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CONF.CRITERIA) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CONF.CRITERIA, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONF.CRITERIA, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CONF.CRITERIA) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CONF.CRITERIA, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CONF.CRITERIA ELSE CONF.CRITERIA END CRITERIA , CONF.CRITERIA AS CHK_CRITERIA FROM NVD_DATA_CONFIGURATIONS CONF WHERE 1=1 AND MATCH(CONF.CRITERIA) AGAINST ( (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TBL.CRITERIA SEPARATOR ' ') AS URI FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CPE23URI, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CPE23URI ELSE CPE23URI END CRITERIA FROM OSS_INCLUDE_CPE WHERE OSS_COMMON_ID IN ( SELECT (SELECT OSS_COMMON_ID FROM OSS_COMMON WHERE OSS_NAME = OC.OSS_NAME) AS OSS_COMMON_ID FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME) GROUP BY CPE23URI ) TBL) ) ) CONF WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CPE23URI, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CPE23URI ELSE CPE23URI END CRITERIA FROM OSS_INCLUDE_CPE WHERE OSS_COMMON_ID IN ( SELECT (SELECT OSS_COMMON_ID FROM OSS_COMMON WHERE OSS_NAME = OC.OSS_NAME) AS OSS_COMMON_ID FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME) GROUP BY CPE23URI ) TBL WHERE CONF.CRITERIA = TBL.CRITERIA ) ) NVD INNER JOIN NVD_CVE_V3 CVE ON NVD.CVE_ID = CVE.CVE_ID LEFT JOIN NVD_CPE_MATCH_NAMES MAT ON NVD.MATCH_CRITERIA_ID = MAT.MATCH_CRITERIA_ID ) TBL GROUP BY TBL.PRODUCT, TBL.CVE_ID, TBL.VERSION, TBL.CRITERIA ) NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '-') AS VERSION, OM.CRITERIA FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CPE.CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE.CPE23URI, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CPE.CPE23URI, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CPE.CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE.CPE23URI, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CPE.CPE23URI ELSE CPE.CPE23URI END CRITERIA FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT JOIN OSS_INCLUDE_CPE CPE ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = CPE.OSS_COMMON_ID WHERE CPE.CPE23URI IS NOT NULL ) OM ON OC.OSS_NAME = OM.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION, OM.CRITERIA ) OC ON NVD.CRITERIA = OC.CRITERIA AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT CONF.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, IF(OC.VERSION = '-', '', OC.VERSION) AS VERSION FROM ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME ) OC INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_CONFIGURATIONS CONF ON CONF.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND OC.VERSION = SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONF.CRITERIA, ':', 6), ':', -1) GROUP BY CONF.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION
UNION
SELECT CONF.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION AS VERSION FROM ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION, ALIAS.OSS_VERSION_ALIAS AS VERSION FROM ( SELECT OC.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME ) OC LEFT JOIN OSS_VERSION_ALIAS ALIAS ON OC.OSS_ID = ALIAS.OSS_ID ) OC INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_CONFIGURATIONS CONF ON CONF.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND OC.VERSION = SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONF.CRITERIA, ':', 6), ':', -1) GROUP BY CONF.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION
UNION
SELECT CONF.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, IF(OC.VERSION = '-', '', OC.VERSION) AS VERSION FROM ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_CONFIGURATIONS CONF ON CONF.PRODUCT = REPLACE(NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONF.CRITERIA, ':', 6), ':', -1) = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NAME, OC.VERSION
UNION
SELECT CONF.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION AS VERSION FROM ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION, ALIAS.OSS_VERSION_ALIAS AS VERSION FROM ( SELECT OC.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_ID, OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC LEFT JOIN OSS_VERSION_ALIAS ALIAS ON OC.OSS_ID = ALIAS.OSS_ID ) OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_CONFIGURATIONS CONF ON CONF.PRODUCT = REPLACE(NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONF.CRITERIA, ':', 6), ':', -1) = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) TBL ON CVE.CVE_ID = TBL.CVE_ID AND CVE.CVSS_SCORE >= #{standardScore} ORDER BY TBL.OSS_NAME, TBL.VERSION DESC, CVE.CVSS_SCORE DESC

SELECT CONF.MATCH_CRITERIA_ID, CONF.CVE_ID, CONF.PRODUCT, CONF.VERSION, CONF.CRITERIA, CONF.VER_START_INC, CONF.VER_END_INC, CONF.VER_START_EXC, CONF.VER_END_EXC , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(PATCH_LINK) FROM NVD_DATA_PATCH_LINK WHERE CVE_ID = CONF.CVE_ID) AS PATCH_LINK FROM NVD_DATA_CONFIGURATIONS CONF WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT CVE.CVE_ID, TBL.OSS_NAME FROM NVD_CVE_V3 CVE INNER JOIN ( SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OSS_NAME != '-' AND EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND OSS_NAME != '-' AND EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OSS_NAME, OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = '-' GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME , IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME, '-' AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = '-' GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME FROM NVD_DATA_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' AND NICK.OSS_NICKNAME REGEXP '[-]' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.VENDORPRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME FROM NVD_DATA_SCORE_V3 NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, NICK.OSS_NAME, '-' AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' AND NICK.OSS_NICKNAME REGEXP '[-]' GROUP BY NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC ON NVD.VENDORPRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND NVD.VERSION = '-' GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME FROM ( SELECT TBL.* FROM ( SELECT NVD.PRODUCT, CVE.CVE_ID, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(IFNULL(MAT.CPE23URI, NVD.CHK_CRITERIA) , ':', 6), ':', -1) AS VERSION, NVD.CRITERIA FROM ( SELECT CONF.* FROM ( SELECT CONF.MATCH_CRITERIA_ID, CONF.PRODUCT, CONF.VENDOR, CONF.CVE_ID, CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CONF.CRITERIA) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CONF.CRITERIA, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONF.CRITERIA, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CONF.CRITERIA) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CONF.CRITERIA, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CONF.CRITERIA ELSE CONF.CRITERIA END CRITERIA , CONF.CRITERIA AS CHK_CRITERIA FROM NVD_DATA_CONFIGURATIONS CONF WHERE 1=1 AND MATCH(CONF.CRITERIA) AGAINST ( (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TBL.CRITERIA SEPARATOR ' ') AS URI FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CPE23URI, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CPE23URI ELSE CPE23URI END CRITERIA FROM OSS_INCLUDE_CPE WHERE OSS_COMMON_ID IN ( SELECT (SELECT OSS_COMMON_ID FROM OSS_COMMON WHERE OSS_NAME = OC.OSS_NAME) AS OSS_COMMON_ID FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME) GROUP BY CPE23URI ) TBL) ) ) CONF WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CPE23URI, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE23URI, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CPE23URI ELSE CPE23URI END CRITERIA FROM OSS_INCLUDE_CPE WHERE OSS_COMMON_ID IN ( SELECT (SELECT OSS_COMMON_ID FROM OSS_COMMON WHERE OSS_NAME = OC.OSS_NAME) AS OSS_COMMON_ID FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME) GROUP BY CPE23URI ) TBL WHERE CONF.CRITERIA = TBL.CRITERIA ) ) NVD INNER JOIN NVD_CVE_V3 CVE ON NVD.CVE_ID = CVE.CVE_ID LEFT JOIN NVD_CPE_MATCH_NAMES MAT ON NVD.MATCH_CRITERIA_ID = MAT.MATCH_CRITERIA_ID ) TBL GROUP BY TBL.PRODUCT, TBL.CVE_ID, TBL.VERSION, TBL.CRITERIA ) NVD INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '-') AS VERSION, OM.CRITERIA FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, CASE WHEN (LENGTH(CPE.CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE.CPE23URI, ':', ''))) = 12 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CPE.CPE23URI, ':', 5), ':', -2) WHEN (LENGTH(CPE.CPE23URI) - LENGTH(REPLACE(CPE.CPE23URI, ':', ''))) < 12 THEN CPE.CPE23URI ELSE CPE.CPE23URI END CRITERIA FROM OSS_COMMON OC LEFT JOIN OSS_INCLUDE_CPE CPE ON OC.OSS_COMMON_ID = CPE.OSS_COMMON_ID WHERE CPE.CPE23URI IS NOT NULL ) OM ON OC.OSS_NAME = OM.OSS_NAME WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION, OM.CRITERIA ) OC ON NVD.CRITERIA = OC.CRITERIA AND NVD.VERSION = OC.VERSION GROUP BY NVD.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT CONF.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME FROM ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME ) OC INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_CONFIGURATIONS CONF ON CONF.PRODUCT = REPLACE(OC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') AND OC.VERSION = SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONF.CRITERIA, ':', 6), ':', -1) GROUP BY CONF.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME
UNION
SELECT CONF.CVE_ID, OC.OSS_NAME FROM ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, IF(IFNULL(OC.OSS_VERSION, '') = '', '-', OC.OSS_VERSION) AS VERSION FROM OSS_COMPONENTS OC WHERE OC.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} AND OC.REFERENCE_DIV = #{referenceDiv} AND IFNULL(OC.OSS_NAME, '') != '' AND OC.OSS_NAME != '-' AND OC.EXCLUDE_YN != 'Y' GROUP BY OC.OSS_NAME, OC.OSS_VERSION ) OC INNER JOIN ( SELECT OC.OSS_NAME, NICK.OSS_NICKNAME FROM OSS_NICKNAME NICK INNER JOIN OSS_COMMON OC ON NICK.OSS_COMMON_ID = OC.OSS_COMMON_ID ) NICK ON OC.OSS_NAME = NICK.OSS_NAME INNER JOIN NVD_DATA_CONFIGURATIONS CONF ON CONF.PRODUCT = REPLACE(NICK.OSS_NICKNAME, ' ', '_') AND SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONF.CRITERIA, ':', 6), ':', -1) = OC.VERSION GROUP BY CONF.CVE_ID, NICK.OSS_NAME ) TBL ON CVE.CVE_ID = TBL.CVE_ID AND CVE.CVSS_SCORE >= #{standardScore} ) SEC WHERE SEC.CVE_ID = CONF.CVE_ID AND REPLACE(SEC.OSS_NAME, ' ', '_') = CONF.PRODUCT ) GROUP BY CONF.CVE_ID, CONF.PRODUCT, CONF.VERSION
SELECT PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_MASTER WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND CVSS_SCORE_MAX IS NULL ORDER BY PRJ_ID DESC
